Solution Description: PIXEL EYE , adopt TensorFlow and Keras technology , plus high-end GPU computing , which achieve real-time object detection , track and object category recognition . This technology can also be apply to crowd flow monitoring with provide different information about the flow of people : such as number of people , average dwell time , distribution of detected object at each location , and predict movement path and traffic data . It can achieve good accuracy even the scene be very crowded and also handle overlapping of people properly . Our track system can provide various information about the customer such as the number of people , their average staying time , the distribution at each location and predict the move path and traffic data . Such information can be available in real time , and we provide customizable backend for manager to view and analyze such information at their convenience with process high performance GPU .

Solution Description: Esri China ( HK ) be specialize in provide Geographic Information Systems ( GIS ) solution base on Esri ’ s ArcGIS technology which enable integration with different smart city component like transport , security , urban planning , healthcare , asset management , disaster and common operational picture for emergency response . Esri China ( HK ) be honor to be award the SOA-QPS by the Office of the Government Chief Information Officer ( OGCIO ) since 2005 . Cloud platform and geographic information system ( GIS ) software together give business the ability to analyze massive amount of information . ArcGIS Online , ArcGIS Pro , Operations Dashboard for ArcGIS , Collector for ArcGIS , Survey 123 be all part of the Esri Geospatial Cloud . The resultant location intelligence often reveal deep insight and innovative way to increase efficiency . With a geospatial cloud , one can create map that represent thousand of relationship between hundred of layer of data on demographic , sale , population growth , likely customer , competitor , supply chain , delivery route , and countless other variable . The Esri Geospatial Cloud enable national , state , and local government to map critical issue , from health to crime to utility line . It support the work of nongovernmental organization involve in environmental issue , address social justice concern and crisis response for natural disaster . A geospatial cloud also allow location intelligence data to be easily combine with artificial intelligence and predictive analytics to map out way to drive productivity or adjust strategy before big problem develop . Our Professional Service Team have work with over 30 HKSAR Government department for over 20 year and have develop a thorough understanding of the department ’ requirement and procedure . In fact , develop as a common data environment for collect , managing , analyze and share of geospatial information , the ArcGIS platform have be widely adopt as the standard GIS software in many governmental department such as Lands Department , Planning Department , Housing Department , Hong Kong Police Force , Fire Services Department , Water Supplies Department , Highways Department , and Transport Department .

Use Case: The Esri Geospatial Cloud can empower government department to run more efficiently and make good decision in public service . Some example as below : Development Bureau / Related Departments GIS can help identify area of interest in land development by incorporate smart city component through map overlay analysis on base map , 3D terrain , utility pipeline asset and other location information . The common information share platform for surveyor , engineer and urban planner in various department lead to inform policy make such as avoid develop area with high flood frequency that may unlikely attract resident . Spatial information be make easily accessible across department in a digital space know as common data environment ( CDE ) . Security Bureau/ Related Departments ArcGIS provide a real-time platform for emergency response on a Common Operational Picture for cross departmental cooperation . Designed for major event planning and monitoring , Operations Dashboard for ArcGIS provide a timely summary of what be happen in a designated area . Information from various source such as location of key target , move vehicle can all be view on the same web or mobile map . Frontline officer be able to take prompt and accurate decision when handle accident and emergency situation . Environment Bureau/ Related Departments On a common Web GIS platform , Environment Bureau can consolidate and visualize a vast amount of environmental information in 2D/3D format collect by GPS-enabled mobile device in different division under the Environmental Protection Department . The Web GIS platform also provide analytical function for GIS data manipulation across the department with security control on the access right to some sensitive and/or classify data for internal process . Food and Health Bureau/ Related Departments Web GIS / Mobile GIS platform be a cross departmental information share platform which redefine the way government approach health and human service workflow . Spatial analysis can uncover significant pattern or trend that provide a broad context for further investigation . Combining this spatial data platform with other crucial detail be a powerful way to expose the issue involve in food and health . Public health us of GIS include track child immunization , conduct health policy research , and establish service area and district . GIS provide a way to move data from the project level to policy-making level so that it can be use by the entire Bureau . Transport and Housing Bureau/ Related Departments Using GIS and build relationship to gather and visualize available data on housing and other urban condition could make evidence-based policy that affect public housing and transport . Building on a cross-departmental information share platform , advance GIS spatial analysis empowers housing authority to make informed decision , result in good housing policy and identify the most suitable development opportunity on a common spatial analytics platform across multiple department . GIS can help in achieve excellence in transportation as well . It significantly aid in planning , monitoring and managing complex system involve in transportation planning and management more effectively . GIS help in determine capacity enhancement , improve operation , asset management and identify the most strategic investment for the transportation system in marine port , air terminal , railway , as well as road and highway .

Solution Name (Eng): Centimeter level precision GNSS positioning Android tablet/smartphone
Solution Name (TC): 具有厘米級GNSS定位精準度的Android 平板電腦/智能電話
Solution Description: Our tablet ( Nilamtec T1P and T1F ) and smartphones ( Nilamtec A1P ) use Real Time Kinematic ( RTK ) technology , and use the Hong Kong government 's open data ( Hong Kong Satellite Positioning Reference Station Network ( SatRef ) GNSS Raw Data Stream ( RTCM ) Format ) ) , improve the accuracy of general GNSS positioning from ten meter to centimeter ( horizontal and vertical error can reach centimeter level ) . This tablet be simple and easy to use , the operator do not need to be train in survey work , in an open sky environment Download ( such as rural area ) , make centimeter-level measurement . The obtain data can also be upload in real time through the android application and share with the team to improve work efficiency . This equipment be particularly suitable for measurement require centimeter to meter , such as lamp post , canal cover , fire hydrant , and tree coordinate measurement , underground facility path coordinate recording , land use law enforcement , civil/road and bridge engineering construction , airport construction , environmental protection information Records , etc . This equipment can also be connect to the BIM system ( Note : Android software be require ) , and provide accurate on-site measurement data for construction record and analysis . Users can save considerable time and cost of measurement work .

Climate and Weather
Commerce and Industry
Development
Environment
Housing

This equipment can also be connect to the BIM system ( Note : Android software be require ) , and provide accurate on-site measurement data for construction record and analysis . Compared with traditional measurement method , this product can greatly reduce measurement cost and time , increase mobility , and coordinate teamwork and communication .

Solution Name (Eng): Falling Alert System for Elderly Care-- Optical Monitoring System (OMS)
Solution Description: OMS propose its camera solution as a well alternative , which do not require elderly use any wearable technology , and could instantly detect a fall motion which alert the person-in-charge . The AI solution component be facial recognition that differentiate the identity of all elderly inside the center , 3D key-point recognition that detect the motion of fall , and object recognition that identify object that might cause the fall . The solution component be all under 1 system .
Application Areas:
City Management
Development
Environment
Housing
Infrastructure
Population
Social Welfare
Technologies Used:
Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Data Analytics
Deep Learning
Machine Learning
Use Case: Falling be consider the most common source of injury amongst the elderly population . Approximately 30 % -50 % of fall cause minor injury such as bruise and abrasion , and around 10 % result in major injury , include fracture and brain injury-related death . Elderly center have be actively try to prevent the fall , but accident do happen and an immediate response could avoid the situation to worsen . The exist solution to this problem be the ‘ safety bell ’ that require elderly to always wear it on their neck and push the button whenever there be an emergency- such as they have fall . Although the device could instantly contact nearby hospital and inform police station , it be largely dependent on Elderlies push the button , hence when they be unconscious or think they could manage by themselves , will often delay the best time to receive medical treatment and worsen the situation . The fall alert aspect use facial recognition that identify the elderly , and key-point recognition that recognize the body key-points such as joint , limb etc hence know when there be irregular body movement cause a fall . When a fall be detect , an instant alert will be send to the end-user through an online dashboard ( APP/Web ) allow elderly to receive immediate care prevent the situation to further worsen .

Solution Name (Eng): A smart lamp pole system with AI-enabled security system
Solution Description: This be a road lamp system that have a number of component on it : weather station , WIFI / 5G station , public announcement system , digital signage , EV be charge station , radar speed ( for vehicle speed check ) , a call point , and CCTV . Some of the component be self explanatory . It enhance public security by 24/7 monitor the surroundings event , people behavior .
Application Areas:
City Management
Law and Security
Technologies Used:
Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Cloud Computing
Data Analytics
Internet of Things (IoT)
Machine Learning
Use Case: This be a road lamp system that have a number of component on it : weather station , WIFI / 5G station , public announcement system , digital signage , EV be charge station , radar speed ( for vehicle speed check ) , a call point , and CCTV . Some of the component be self explanatory . For radar , this help to enforce road safety by do speed check and CCTV can take photo for speed ticket . CCTV stream be rout to the backend server , where the AI-enabled object recognition algorithm be run . The application could include : traffic light schedule for count car ( and take speed ) and pedestrian on the road , in order to assign traffic light signal in real time ; the AI-enabled CCTV stream be able to monitor the surrondings to spot dangerous activity , such as people hold a gun / knief / weapon / etc ; the microphone on the CCTV be able to monitor gun shot , break glass , crowd gathering , etc . These monitoring will not spot a specific person , so that the data privacy be preserve . To summarize : 1. public safety monitoring by AI-enabled CCTV and algorithms 2. number of pedestrian counting ( wait for traffic light ) 3. approach vehicle counting and speed check 4. combine 2 and 3 will be able to control traffic light priority to those in need , and have warn on fast approaching vehicle

Solution Name (Eng): ShipAny - First Smart Logistics Gateway for HK Domestic Logistics Service
Solution Description: Appcider announce and release ShipAny logistics platform with easy connector for Online Store , Trading ERP application and other application in 2018 . Every user would be able to adopt ShipAny to address their delivery difficulty , with wide range of choice ( domestic , chilling/frozen logistics , international , smart locker , Circle-K ) , discount shipping rate ( 30-60 % discount ) and in fully automate operation . ShipAny be capable to provide real-time shipping quote , ship label generation , courier notification for pick-up and real-time shipment track . Merchants be only require to register a single ShipAny account before enjoy the high quality shipping service with low cost because of aggregated shipment volume . ShipAny be also a smart gateway to interconnect logistics supply and demand side . We hope every courier ( especially traditional courier ) could easily connect to customer and enter the E-commerce market with strong logistics demand , and offer logistics service and receive shipment order through ShipAny ’ s facility . ShipAny will play a vital role to bridge up the fast-growing e-Commerce , trading and logistic industry .
Application Areas:
Commerce and Industry
Food
Logistics, Supply Chain
Technologies Used:
Blockchain
Cloud Computing
Data Analytics
Use Case: HKSAR Government and its department have strong demand on various logistics service and at the same time , HKSAR Post Office provide high quality courier service . Below we describe how ShipAny help to increase efficiency and productivity : A ) HKSAR Post Office - Courier Service Provider for E-Commerce Existing difficulty : HKSAR Post Office now provide high quality courier/post service with competitive pricing , specific for E-Commerce , but the market share be limit as there 's miss channel to interconnect with E-commerce ( logistics demand party ) . Besides , it be still require Merchant ( the online store owner ) to drop off parcel with long queue which be a barrier for Merchants How ShipAny increase efficiency and help : ShipAny already provide full set of E-commerce/Online Store solution plugins for these online store easily connect to multiple logistics courier by a single click setup . For example , ShipAny provide plugins for famous E-commerce solution like OpenCart , Magento , Shopify , Shopline .... Once ShipAny able to connect to HKSAR Post Office system , all these E-commerce solution ( and the online store use this solution ) will easy connect to HKSAR Post Office courier service and adopt the service with full automation . ShipAny bring HKSAR Post Office to the E-Commerce eco-system with hot connection and also bring more new online store ( customer of Post Office ) to Post Office B ) HKSAR Post Office - New Smart Locker and Convenient Store Service Existing difficulty : HKSAR Post Office now serve over thousand of registered letter/parcels ( deliver to residential home ) per month . It be well-known that the cost of deliver to residential home be very high and the receiver not always at home introduce extra cost . How ShipAny increase efficiency and help : ShipAny already connect to multiple smart locker provider like Pakpabox , E-link , Locker Life and convenient store like Circle-K . These locker and convenient store bring 7x24 service for end-user to pickup . This greatly reduce the workload and cost for deliver to residential home . Solution Name (Eng): ATAL’s Cloud-based Chiller Plant Energy Management Platform (EM-Platform)
Solution Name (TC): 安樂工程雲端製冷機組能源管理平台
Company Name (Tc): 安樂機電設備工程有限公司
Solution Description: ‘ ATAL ’ s Cloud-based Chiller Plant Energy Management Platform ’ be an award-winning solution at the Hong Kong ICT Awards 2019 in the category of “ Big Data & Open Data Applications ” . This platform be an all-in-one intelligent system leverage big data analytics and machine learning ( ML ) for achieve building energy efficiency and sustainable development . ATAL ’ s Dynamic Optimisation be build upon the basis of self-trained physics-guided machine learning ( ML ) model use actual operating data . This ensure energy performance of the whole chiller plant be optimise in real-time use advanced modelling and optimisation technique . Buildings can achieve up to 30 % energy saving on chiller plant operation with the use of the platform , depend on the building type and the building ’ current energy performance .
Application Areas:
City Management

Commerce and Industry
Development
Environment
Housing
Technologies Used:
Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Cloud Computing
Data Analytics
Machine Learning
Predictive Analytics
Use Case: In line with the Smart City vision of the HKSAR Government , make use of innovation and technology in the built environment be the key to achieve build energy efficiency and sustainable development . The smart city market be expect to grow continuously with the support of the Government , as highlight in the recently release “ Hong Kong Smart City Blueprint ” ( ITB , 2018 ) . Besides the HKSAR Government have set an ambitious carbon intensity reduction target of 65 % to 70 % by 2030 use 2005 as the base , which be equivalent to 26 % to 36 % absolute reduction and a reduction to 3.3-3.8 tonne on a per caput basis ( EB , 2018 ) . Given the dominance of air-conditioning ( AC ) system in build energy consumption , and of building in Hong Kong ’ s overall energy use and greenhouse gas ( GHG ) emission , ensure AC system be run at the high possible energy efficiency be crucial to realisation of Hong Kong ’ s GHG emission reduction target . Greater utilisation of build data to serve this purpose be , therefore , a necessary strategy to take . The data-driven approach adopt in the design of the platform make it easy to deploy without replace the costly central equipment or disrupt operation .

Solution Description: WildFaces ' iQ-Dwell Time Management System can analyse crowd behaviour and dynamic anonymously in real-time , which can help manage dynamic queue in crowded place aim to reduce congestion and distribute traffic in the most optimal way . Our system can calculate individual travel time as well as average travel time between multiple point . This be also useful for manage Queues . The privacy of individual can be completely protect as the actual image can be anonymized such that general operator can not see the face . Only authorized official can actually see the face of the person . The system provide a useful dashboard with sufficient information such as average dwell time , individual dwell time , demographic statistic to manage queue and historic data that can be analyze to understand the route that people take through an environment and how long they spend in each place . If we can tag people , we can tag vehicle as well , use license plate recognition , make this solution also applicable to road and traffic management .

This can tell them to open up more Immigration counter for example and help them manage queue . • The ability to find lost child almost real time will ensure safety . Organizations be able to act quickly to save child from be abduct . The same system can be use to find lost elderly people . • It can help to bring the current concert ticket scalp problem under control . The system can differentiate between repeat offender and genuine purchaser . It can manage queue , identify fight in real time and prevent escalation of such incident . • Better visitor experience : Reducing queue time and congestion management all help to enhance the Visitor Experience . This can be useful in Shopping Malls and Retail Stores to determine how long customer spend on average in one area relative to another . This enable them to understand their customer 's behaviour and help them with strategic product placement . • Better traffic management – road and transit system • Create harmony between tourist and resident . People go to Attractions or Theme Parks to have fun . They expect to be safe and free to enjoy themselves . A real-time navigation system can recommend the best route for Visitors so as to avoid highly crowd area and create harmony between local citizen and visitor .

Solution Description: TicketME be a blockchain base electronic ticket ( e-ticket ) platform . It incorporate Distributed Ledger Technologies ( DLT ) and leverage exist ticket system and e-wallets operate by Stored Value Facility ( SVF ) license to transform Hong Kong 's ticket industry from physical ticket to more secured , smart and simple electronic ticket . Not only do it meet the Smart City Initiative by allow great convenience through innovation and technology , our solution also help to tackle ticket scalping by Smart Contract implementation with a permanent tamper-proof ledger . TicketME provide an option to the event organiser for manage ticket ownership and transfer after initial sale , which be currently lack , in term of a more structured control system .
Application Areas: Recreation and Culture
Technologies Used: Blockchain
Use Case: One of the propose use case for TicketME be target at popular concert hold at the Hong Kong Coliseum . Consumer flow ( for public sale ) : Similar to how consumer currently buy their ticket online , they will be able to purchase ticket via URBTIX . There be an additional option of e-ticket delivery . They will only need to input their HK mobile phone number or email address for the purchase . Once transaction be confirm , they will receive a activation link . If they haven ’ t already download an e-wallet , they will need to register with a provider with basic personal information . Their e-ticket be instantly store in their e-wallet once they can successfully answer a knowledge-authentication question . If they need to transfer any e-tickets from the e-wallet , they simply one-time upgrade their e-wallet account by upload additional identification document ( such as HKID ) to the provider . Once that be verify , they can transfer their e-tickets and collect the equivalent ( or low ) value of their ticket from the recipient via their e-wallets . Their recipient will receive a message , and they can choose to accept or reject this transfer . If they choose to accept , the e-ticket will be send to them and they can also choose to transfer this e-ticket to another recipient by upload same identification document if require . To enter the concert , consumer simply execute their e-ticket and a dynamic QR code will be generate . This be scan by a Wi-Fi connected scanner and verify at entrance . Each person will hold their own e-ticket . Once the ticket be exercise , QR code can not be generate and it be not valid for entry again . Consumer flow ( for internal subscription ) : A specific web portal will be give to event sponsor to distribute to their audience . These consumer will be able to access these allocate ticket and have the option of e-ticket delivery . The same flow applies to these ticket holder , whereby they will receive a activation link and once an e-wallet be download , they can access and transfer their e-tickets via the e-wallet . Consumer benefit : The whole flow be highly secure . Authentication be require to open the activation link that grant consumer access to their e-tickets . Additional identification be require to transfer ticket to others . E-tickets be exercise via a dynamic QR code that can not be forge or duplicate and send to others . Storage of data be minimize and encrypt with TicketME . With blockchain ’ s permanent tamper-proof ledger , this information be transparent , time-stamped and traceable . The whole experience be very simple . Consumers can transfer e-tickets to family and friend without schedule a time to meet up to exchange physical ticket . And with each person hold their own e-ticket , they can enter the concert at their own schedule , there be no need to wait for others who be hold their ticket outside the venue . The whole process be very smart . Based on the need of stakeholder and the public , various limitation can be set onto ticket transfer activity via Smart Contract . Consumer cost : There will be a small handling fee for choose the e-ticket option . This fee be comparable to the register mailing cost of physical ticket , but the benefit and convenience of have a smart e-ticket will significantly outweigh the cost .

Solution Name (Eng): Smart City Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Infrastructure Solution
Solution Name (TC): 智能城市的電動汽車（EV）充電基礎設施解決方案
Solution Description: Demand for Electric Vehicle be on the rise for reason that include increase number of affordable and efficient model in the market from 2019 onwards , grow concern about our environment and the impact of air pollution on our health and etc . A number of country in the world have already set a deadline to ban the sale of petroleum car in year ahead . Therefore it be necessary to develop a common EV charger infrastructure use a common protocol , which could cover charger of various output power , mobile apps for control , flexible payment system , management and control platform , and with load management solution for power limited building , altogether combine in one integrated solution . This notion serve the basic framework of evMega Smart Charger Infrastructure design and also provide a clear direction for our R & D work to cater for the smart mobility need of our future smart city . The role of HK Government be critically important . It be expect to take the lead and set the benchmark for this well-planned and developed ev charger infrastructure .
Application Areas:
City Management
Commerce and Industry
Development
Environment
Housing
Infrastructure
Transport
Technologies Used:
Internet of Things (IoT)
Mobile Technologies
Radio Frequency Identification (RFID)
Use Case: 1. ev Chargers of various type ( AC/DC ) , socket type , mount method , power output ( from 7kw to 350kw ) to satisfy requirement of different car parking environment serve both home charging and destination charging requirement . Medium charger can be instal in government building to serve the charge need of their fleet of electric vehicle . High power ( super/ultra fast ) charger can be instal in public area to provide immediate charging service to citizen . 2 . Use of common OCPP 1.60 ( Open Charge Point Protocol version 1.6 ) , an application protocol for communication between EV charge station and a central management system . It support smart charge control and management , load balancing , multi-payment , big data sharing , JSON client/server communication protocol for more secure and fast connection . In particular , ( a ) For charge station owner , it provide great choice and flexibility ; ( b ) For user , the protocol encourage charge station to compete on price , service , product feature and innovation ; ( c ) for city planner , it make it easy to create a large-scale , visible network ; ( d ) for developer , it reduce the development cost since software that provide additional functionality would only need to be develop once . 3 ) Flexible payment system that support both membership ( in apps registration ) and non-membership via payment kiosk . The charger be Octopus type-test approve and can support other payment gateway , e.g . Fast Payment Service , through integration . It ’ s future proof and allow the site operator , include HKSAR Gov ’ t , to recoup the cost of the charging service , esp in future when more EVs will come into the market . Payment in public car park will be inevitable but become acceptable . 4 ) Mobile Apps support add feature such as location search , charger status monitoring , remote charger reservation , in-apps payment , QR Code scanning , order status monitoring and etc . It make charge smart and hassle-free , reduce the range anxiety of driver and facilitate the achievement of smart mobility of HKSAR Gov ’ t smart city development project . 5 ) `` Snapcharge '' Control and Management Platform allow user management , order management , payment transaction management , power consumption ( kw/Amp/Volts ) recording and analysis , charger/charging station monitoring and etc . It enable real-time monitoring of the charger and operation status for good after-sales management . The operator can generate report for analyze the performance for good planning . 6 ) Load Management Controller maximize the availability of charger by different algorithm , e.g . even distribution , queue , dynamic , which be particular suitable for old/existing building where power grid be always not sufficient to serve power input need of all charger in the same car park space . It facility the charger installation and adoption of more electric vehicle which be more environmental friendly since it have tail pipe to emit air pollute gas . Remark : the propose solution will focus on the demonstration of Platform , App and Load Management .

Solution Description: 1/ Using facial recognition for access control in various application ( e.g . lift assignment , turnstile ) 2/ Using object detection engine for analytics in people count , walk speed , movement direction , density of pedestrian . 3/ Using object detection engine for vehicle class detection , count and movement direction .

City Management
Commerce and Industry
Development
Population
Transport

Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Data Analytics

Use Case: For AccuID , it be a facial recognition engine that could integrate with various access control system . It provide a fast and accurate secure access to government promise for designate personnel only . We have experience to integrate with partner offer lift system to commercial building , so that when user pass through the access gateway , the lift could automatically be assign the relevant floor immediately within second . Our system provide secure access also quick access for divert congest traffic at lobby in second . Pedestrian analytics solution be use object detection to automate the counting and measurement of people crowd . The engine could provide statistic about people count , gender and age group ( in 10 year range ) classification , walk speed , movement direction and density analytics . So instead of have real person to do ticker service for spot measurement at the street , the system could replace the manual work and populate statistical figure for further city planning analytics simply by set up camera for record footage for automatic work flow . Similar to pedestrian analytics , the vehicle analytic solution could also record the no . of vehicle cross a specific spot , the movement speed and change in direction . The system be plan to identify more than 14 class of vehicle , such that the information could be use for further road planning and traffic planning purpose .

Solution Description: IQ-Road & Traffic be a comprehensive portfolio of application that can fulfill each department ’ s specific requirement while operating as a single integrated system to ensure quick distribution of information to all concern when any event occur . The software can cope with complex and change environment , such as different time period for park regulation , park specification for particular vehicle , and the flexibility to meet any unexpected incident . WildFaces also have a comprehensive monitoring system to monitor the entire city ’ s traffic , from high speed freeway to low-speed area , such as school , shop mall and hospital . Many other monitor system , require induction loop , radar and other technology that require civil work .

Housing
Infrastructure
Transport

Data Analytics

Machine Learning
Mobile Technologies
Predictive Analytics
Use Case: • Protect bridge and other critical infrastructure – e.g . detect abandon object or suspicious object at the “ pylon ” or “ footing ” of bridge • Surveillance system health check to prevent camera tampering or sabotage • Traffic management – e.g . vehicle counting , average speed , congestion and average waiting time • Comprehensive reporting across multiple camera • Parking violation and at the “ No stop zone ” . Use of iQ-Hawk and License Plate Recognition or Face Recognition system to assist law enforcement and automate the finding process for the violated vehicle and individual • Efficient Traffic light management – can be adjust dynamically depend on the current traffic situation , e.g . allow long time for pedestrian if there be more pedestrian waiting at the crossroad • Smoke and fire detection particularly in the tunnel environment • Road maintenance – understand the flow and maximum “ load ” requirement particularly for large and heavy vehicle • Prevent Hawking in prohibited area • Prevent certain vehicle type on certain road section ( e.g . bus lane ) • Detect illegal driving , e.g . speeding , red light violation , etc • Traffic Light Management base on number of pedestrian at light • Respond quickly to accident – detect accident , vehicle stop , “ near miss ” on the road or highway • Detect “ cross lane ” on double solid line in tunnel or prohibit section • Incorrect direction on one way roads • Intrusion of bikes/humans on the road • Color base detection • Collision prevention at level crossing • Detect abandon object or fall objects/debris • Detect pedestrian jaywalking , skateboard etc • Prevent people cross the major highway or enter the tunnel

Solution Name (Eng): A.I. Contact Center and User Engagement Solution
Solution Name (TC): 智能聯絡中心和客戶互動解決方案
Solution Description: The solution aim to solve the pain point of department run a contact center . Our solution provide a 24x7 A.I . virtual assistant to handle inquiry in Chinese , Cantonese and English . The assistant can also be train to follow up with the user . Departments can integrate the virtual assistant on multiple platform such as WhatsApp , WeChat , Messenger , Websites and Mobile Apps as an effective engagement tool with the user . When the assistant do not know the answer , it can redirect to a human . Both voice and text be support .
Application Areas:
Broadcasting
Commerce and Industry
Finance
Technologies Used:
Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Data Analytics
Deep Learning
Machine Learning
Natural Language Processing
Use Case: The A.I . Contact Center and User Engagement Solution improve the quality of public service in mainly five area , 1 ) 24X7 automate handling of complaint and inquiry The solution provide real-time response to inquiry across various channel , power by a centralized natural language processing engine . 2 ) Integration with Live Chat solution to provide The solution be integrate with many live chat solution that can utilize skill-based routing to escalate the inquiry to human agent to handle . The response provide by the human agent can be use to train the NLP service to handle in the future . 3 ) NLP Document Search The solution can perform document search on form , article , and policy to find the most relevant information for the user inquiry . Compared to tradition keyword search , NLP search improve search accuracy by understand searcher intent and the contextual meaning of the inquiry . 4 ) Centralized knowledge base for human agent and A.I . The NLP service can also be use for the human agent to find the best answer when they handle public complaint . For human agent , they can utilize our solution to manage knowledge base , search handle inquiry case , perform analytics in a single system . 5 ) Quality control and analytics The solution provide insight and report on the quality of the customer service for various complaint or inquiry , the percentage of inquiry be automate and highlight inquiry that require improvement .

Solution Description: A grow number of pharma company be discover the power of put smart NFC tag on or into their product package , as part of a label , a closure , or the container itself . Smart NFC tag can deliver several benefit . They give each product a unique identity , and support additional security feature and functionality , so each item easy to authenticate and trace . NFC tag also provide a direct link to the cloud , so product can join the pharmaceutical Internet of Things ( IoT ) . By tap the product package with an NFC-enabled smartphone , people can use the smart , IoT-connected NFC tag to access everything from authenticity check to dose information , diagnostic tool , and supply chain detail . There be three reason why NFC tagging be an ideal choice for smart pharma application . First , NFC be design for secure ID application , since each NFC tag carry a unique ID and can incorporate proven security feature , include cryptographic algorithm , that safeguard data . Second , NFC offer data storage for on-product data , from a simple web link to a tamper-evident or ambient-temperature status , for quick , efficient interaction . And third , NFC connect to off-product information , provide access to large amount of cloud-based data , such as detailed product information , contextual rule for targeted messaging , historic tracking or an online authentication service . The result be a secure approach to digitalization for just about any pharma product .
Application Areas:
City Management
Environment
Food
Health
Social Welfare
Medical
Technologies Used:
Data Analytics
Internet of Things (IoT)
Radio Frequency Identification (RFID)
Use Case: The Benefits of Smart , NFC-driven Solutions The feature and functionality describe above – secure ID , on-product data , and off-product data – combine to yield a wide range of capability that deliver a variety of benefit , include increase patient safety , high quality assurance , great consumer/patient engagement , and more effective messaging and analytics . 1 ) Anti-Counterfeiting and Channel Traceability : By help to ensure patient safety , combat fraud , and increase traceability , NFC smart tag and label help protect brand and increase consumer confidence.Inspectors and consumer can securely verify that a product be genuine . Verification can happen in near real time , anywhere in the world , by simply tap an NFC-enabled smartphone to the product package.The need to combat counterfeit drug be critical . The World Health Organization ( WHO ) recently report that 8 to 15 % of drug sell globally be fake or substandard . Developing country be more affected than developed country . Not only do fake medicine impact pharma revenue , they pose a health risk , since they can contain incorrect dos , wrong ingredient , or no active ingredient at all.For channel traceability , and to help identify sale outside authorized market , NFC tag can be assign to specific distributor and location . The ability to authenticate and trace product within the supply chain , use location awareness and cloud-based monitoring , also make it easy for pharma company to meet regulatory requirement and protect the last mile to the consumer . By identify cluster of counterfeit , tamper episode , or divert product , pharma company can take corrective action sooner . 2 ) Anti-Tampering and other Product Integrity Assurance : An increase number of medication – as many as one-third of all new FDA approval in the U.S. – be heat sensitive , which mean improper storage and transit issue can impact quality and reduce effectiveness . Regulations for temperature control cover the point between the pharma company and the pharmacy or hospital , but not the last mile to the patient . Smart NFC label can be equip with temperature sensor and data logger that monitor ambient temperature change at any time and report whether a product have be handle correctly , even once it ’ s leave the supply chain and be in the patient ’ s hand . The pharma company can trace when and where any problem occur , for quick remediation , and patient can be certain of a drug ’ s quality and effectiveness.Tamper evidence , which indicate if a product have be open or interfere with prior to sale , be another feature that can reassure patient . Tamper evidence can remove doubt about whether a product have be dilute , refill , or otherwise substitute from the original , for increase consumer-patient confidence . 3 ) Consumer/Patient Engagement : The increase use of apps , wearable , and sensor be evidence that patient want to be more engage in their own care , want to play a more active role in manage their well-being , and want to know more about their medication . Deloitte report that there be over 260,000 health apps in use worldwide and that 70 % of patient group use at least one app to manage their condition – make it clear that a mobile ecosystem have develop within healthcare.On-demand product information , such as ingredient , origin , expiration date , or intend use , along with interaction with smartphone apps , such as medication management tool , diary , or alarm , and connection to doctor and social patient network , give consumer new way to become more engaged . Smart NFC label and package can help patient stick to their treatment plan , since the technology let pharma company communicate key information , such as dosage and usage information , directly to patient via their smartphones.WHO estimate that more than half of patient with chronic disease fail to adhere to their prescribed therapy . Smart NFC package can be configure to sense when a pill be take out of a blister package and then log date and time of the action . This feature , when use with an NFC phone and an app , can generate reminder to take a pill and/or check proper dosage . When combine with cloud connectivity , it can enable treatment monitoring and advice by a physician . Helping patient keep to their dosing schedule can be especially useful with the treatment of chronic illness , such as high blood pressure , diabetes , and other condition that need ongoing care.Smart NFC package also give patient a way to interact with pharma company , in support of the pharmacovigilance task relate to product safety . Mobile consumer/patient engagement can help identify and prevent adverse effect associate with a give medication . Patients can use an application to report any health issue associate with use of a product , and pharmaceutical company can inform their app user if a product be recall . These kind of interaction also create close relationship between pharma company and their consumer/patient customer . 4 ) Automated Device Interaction : Health device , such as glocuse meter and other drug-delivery device , can be equip with NFC reader that communicate with NFC tag refill , to automatically confirm origin and prevent container re-use . NFC tag refill can make product easy to use , too . By store configuration data , the NFC tag can automate setup , and by store expiration date , the NFC tag can ensure the refill be still within its recommended use period .

Solution Description: Customs be responsible for about 70 % of all seizure of counterfeit product in the world . The role of custom be especially important in protect the Hong Kong because the vast majority of counterfeit product be import and , after enter the market , subject to free circulation within the community . However , in anti-counterfeiting custom role be more supportive than proactive , which mean that custom mostly provide help to trademark owner to protect their IPRs when this be request . Customs authority fail to seize large amount of counterfeit either because they do not know how to recognize the fake or because the process of gather statement from trademark owner be too time-consuming . Proper labelling , overt anti-counterfeiting technology and training in recognize counterfeit would , for example , assist official in enforce the IPRs of affected trademark owner . Furthermore , the lack of information sharing be often perceive to be one of the main obstacle in the fight against counterfeiter . Finding counterfeit product be one part of custom responsibility to control the trade . Other control objective include find various kind of dangerous material . While control the trade , however , custom also work to facilitate the trade in order not to disturb import and export . These two objective conflict and thus custom always have to balance the trade-off between control and facilitation . Taking into account also the fact that the vast majority of good that pass through custom be legal and thus should not be disturb , it can be see that find counterfeit good be not among custom ' top priority . Fortunately , development in technology have also enable novel countermeasure . Most notably , the emerge of radio-frequency identification technology have open many opportunity to fight illicit trade . NFC allow for identification of tagged object and establish a link between the physical world and a virtual world with a mobile phone at any place and time . This so called dual existence of object enable a number of new way to manage the physical world , and thus NFC be be use for example to automate many supply chain process .

Use Case: Our patented solution be a turnkey solution platform which enable business , government and customer to digitize their physical product and asset . It create secure digital identity for each instance of these in the Cloud , and provide the mean to authenticate , track , sense , and engage customer , partner , and employee through the value chain . For the first time brand , custom and customer can get the high possible level of visibility and transparency for each individual product and asset from the point of manufacture , throughout the supply chain , across all channel , point of sale and point of use . The benefit of product digitization be virtually unlimited : • Optimizing manufacturing and supply chain by track every single product with item-level granularity and turn demand visibility into allocation efficiency • Maintaining inventory accuracy of close to 100 % , avoid stock out with rapid replenishment , instantly locate misplace item , and prevent product loss • The administrative tracking system can provide a robust set of real time information about the status of the company ’ s product in the field • Enhancing brand protection through consumer-based product authentication and grey market detection

Solution Description: For many decade , Hong Kong have rely on a removal methodology that be effectively one of `` Catch and Kill '' to deal with the stray animal population . With Catch and Kill , animal must be catch and kill every year to control the population . In 2009 , the cost to the HK Government of capture , keep and euthanising stray dog and cat be about HK $ 30 million . AFCD have be accurse of kill animal by the public and have cause bad reputation for the department which have a mission of enhance animal welfare . Our solution provide an out-of-the box solution to the Handling of report lost pet . At the moment , the completeness of micro-chip information need to be improve . Dogs ’ microchip number could help the AMCs unite lose dog with their keeper . However , half of report lost dog be not microchipped and license accordingly .
Application Areas:
City Management
Environment
Social Welfare
Technologies Used:
Internet of Things (IoT)
Mobile Technologies
Radio Frequency Identification (RFID)
Use Case: The O2O platform developed will allow any pet finder with a smartphone or internet access to make direct contact with the pet owner . This be do with extreme privacy control where the pet owner would n't disclose any personal data throughout the process . The pet owner can manage and update their pet info 24/7 . This will include an online web platform and mobile App for both iOS and Android . Hardware product will include micro-chip 2.0 or Smart Pet ID Tag use NFC ( Near Field Technology ) . Our Micro-chip 2.0 solution can provide breakthrough to the exist method to enhance current RFID chipping system , e.g . : 1 . Send Mobile notification to all pet owner within the community when pet lose have occur , to allow pet community to help each other on their lose pet . 2 . No RFID reader be require to read the data on the tag , any person can use their mobile as the reader to read the NFC chip . 3 . The micro-chip system with our Mobile App would allow the founder to make direct contact with the lose pet owner without know any of the pet ’ s owner data e.g . phone number , email or name . The communication between the founder and the owner can be do within 10 second . 4 . Since pet info can be update easily online therefore the data be more likely to be update .

Solution Description: SOCIF have develop a comprehensive intelligent travel IoT system for vehicles.By instal a GPS touch screen device on the vehicle , through our cloud compute algorithm , big data analysis and predictive analysis , we can obtain real-time arrival forecast of any vehicle travel on regular routes.By deploy our customized camera on the vehicle , through artificial intelligence , machine learning , deep learning and image analysis technology , it will detect human movement , flow , seat occupation , etc . in the vehicle ( and even obtain its identity through facial recognition technology ) , So as to obtain the actual seat occupancy rate accordingly . This system can promote real-time monitoring of public transportation or other departmental fleet , personnel deployment management , traffic analysis and city management .

Use Case: Alternative solution to SIM card base solution where cellular network be not an option or long battery life operation be require . One of the major obstacle to achieve the Smart City be the last-mile connectivity for device that need only intermittent transmission of small amount of data . While GSM and 3G/4G/5G cellular network theoretically can do the job today and cover most of the inhabited part of the world , have a subscription for each IoT device may not be economically feasible . Devices such as sensor and meter be often put in place such as stairwell or basement in large concrete building where wireless coverage extension be require . In the rural area or develop country , the cellular network for IoT application may not even exist . For the deployment location where power supply be not accessible , as a low-power wide-area network ( LPWAN ) solution , Synap equipment offer a power save option which extend the battery life to up to 10-years .

Solution Name (Eng): ECOPLANT Solar Tracking Solar Panel System
Solution Description: The creation of Ecoplant fall together with the introduction of a new breakthrough in Solar . Our Solar be base on entirely new technology , base on a so-called `` no glass solar cell encapsulation '' . With this technique give the panel more power , partly because the product move with the sun 40 % more effective ( Sun trace ) . Our flexible Solar panel be make up of MONOCRistalline cell with unique back contact technology which remove electrode from the front . Also the background mirror which be intrigue in the foil reflect more light . The big enemy of solar such as moisture and water be simply convert into water-resistant material by a new patent of 3m ( nanotechnology ) . This same Nanotechnology be also use to clean the ultra-light PV cell which though 80 % light than traditional PV cell over 60 % Energy Efficiency Give . The new technical paradigm lead to a low production footprint and a substantially long life span . Areas to improve in the public service : 1 . CO2 emission reduction . 2 . Embed a Solar Panel System into the natural environment to create a Green Smart City . 3 . Provide charge spot & WiFi spot for HK citizen and visitor . 4 . Enable Sensors to collect environmental data ( i.e . Air Quality ) to HK Government . Area that we propose to install Eco-Plant : 1 . Government Building Open Area . 2 . 1-2 Public Area ( ie . City Hall ) . 3 . Country Park . 4 . R & D Park ( ie . CyberPort , The Hong Kong Science Park .. etc ) . CO2 emission be reduce by more than 65 % .

Recreation and Culture

The current Eco-Energy specially Solar Power be not quite adopt to the living environment . 3 . Lack of awareness in the mass public . 4 . Lack of energy supply in country park area , especially hike route . Solution of Eco-plant 1 . With the Tree Type design , Eco-Plant can adopt to the natural environment which able to enhance the public area integrate with Eco-Energy and Green Designs . 2 . By instal the Eco-Plant , it provide charge spot ( handheld device up to electric car ) to the public . We can also install WiFi hotspot as well . 3 . Country Park - Since Eco-Plant be a solar panel system , it suit to install in the country park area especially hike route without any complicated installation requirement , which able to provide charging , smart lamp for any emergency use . 4 . Promote Eco-Energy to the public . 5 . Since Eco-Plant embed 4G connectivity function , it able to remote monitor and maintenance . By further integrate with sensor , can transmit the environment data to the related Gov't department .

Solution Description: In the 5G era , `` Digital Twin '' have become one of the development direction of smart city . It be a virtual model create for a physical object in a digital way to simulate the behavior in its real environment , so as to realize the understanding , analysis , management and optimization of the physical entity ( ie the real world ) . As a result , `` Digital Twin '' can provide technical support for manager of various department in the city , as follow : In urban planning , map the physical city to the virtual environment , build a digital city , visually display , precise planning , and efficient decision-making ; In term of traffic travel , real-time road scene and real-time traffic information be instant and accurate , and unmanned driving be popular , which be convenient for citizen to travel and facilitate official dispatch and control ; In term of public safety , through the `` Digital Twin '' overview layout , formulate emergency response plan to ensure the safety of citizen ; In term of cultural tourism , digitize historical cultural relic and historical site to protect and inherit historical memory and provide fresh visual experience . However , the realization of `` Digital Twin '' must be base on massive scale of 3D model data , and the focus be on the establishment of city-level high-precision 3D model . The breakthrough of 5G make data transmission no longer an obstacle , but the loading , edit and application of massive 3D model data be still a unified problem in the industry . The various professional software tool use in the above-mentioned industry that rely on 3D model must be run on workstation or mainframe to load 3D model above the GB level . However , Euclideon 's patented unlimited detail load technology can load TB/PB ( 1TB=1024GB , 1PB=1024TB ) level 3D model data in a second on an ordinary computer , and can be combine with most of the current professional 3D model processing software and application tool , Greatly improve work efficiency and visual effect . The system can be apply to multiple government department to realize the transformation and upgrading of urban planning , transportation , public safety , cultural tourism and other field . In view of the different source of exist 3D model of various government department , incompatibility , large scale , lack of detail , and difficulty in display , Euclideon integrate the 3D model data of the entire city , access IoT information , and build a `` Digital Twin '' ; at the same time , it use Euclideon holography Tables , holographic room , and Vault customize client to display ultra-high-precision real-world 3D model , compatible with exist multi-party 3D model professional software tool , and add humanize interactive module to improve work quality and efficiency . Super giant 3D model be the premise and foundation for the realization of `` Digital Twin '' . As the world 's only unlimited 3D model data expert , Euclideon provide you with customize 3D data model solution .

Education
Housing
Infrastructure
Law and Security

Transport
Technologies Used:
Augmented Reality
Internet of Things (IoT)
Virtual Reality
3D Model Processing
Use Case: User Name : Hong Kong International Airport ( Hong Kong International Airport have be rat as the `` Best Airport in the World '' eight time in the past ten year and have make a significant contribution to maintain Hong Kong 's status as an Asian cosmopolitan city . ) User requirement : As the large BIM model owner in Hong Kong , the goal be to integrate 3D model data from multiple source , load TB or even PB level 3D model data in a second on ordinary office computer , and add humanized interaction so that different user can Intuitive experience , and finally realize the real `` smart airport '' in order to maintain the global leading position . Technical solution : The Euclideon Vault platform integrate 3D model of multiple data source for the airport , cover the surround facility of the airport and aircraft model . The huge amount of 3D model data be no longer a problem . Euclideon 's patented infinite detail load technology can instantly load the entire airport model and access IoT information . You can also view the flight status and detailed information of the aircraft at different time period on the screen of Euclideon 's unique holographic table and other device . The highly user-friendly interactive design provide a precise and meticulous experience to help user complete their work with high quality and efficiency . Cost and benefit : The computer 's graphic card , video memory , CPU , hard disk speed , and memory will greatly affect the render speed of the 3D model . The original model of Hong Kong International Airport have about 65 million polygon . The 3D model rendering of ten of million of polygon can only be render at one time by large workstation with a price of more than 300,000 Hong Kong dollar , but it still can not be display as a whole . However , Euclideon ’ s self-developed Vault software only charge 600USD ( equivalent to 4,600HKD ) per year . At a cost ratio of less than 1 % , it can not only render 3D model as a whole without restriction on a common office computer , but also display 3D model as a whole . The effect of this , greatly save cost and expenditure , realize smart city , and become efficient and convenient .

Solution Name (TC): SP RFID智能資產管理系統
Solution Description: SP Asset Management System ( SP-AMS ) : When organization / enterprise grow , business expand , sit multiply and resource accumulate , the protection and management of company asset would pose a great business challenge . These asset could be manufacture product , equipment , machine , hardware , tool , property or any material form . There be risk of theft , inaccurate record , outdated report , audit issue , failure in track asset in transfer and human error cause by manual process . Those organization / enterprise need an effective asset management solution to fully control and monitor the inventory update , the location , the movement and the asset life cycle . SP offer a well-designed , comprehensive RFID-based solution and turn the tedious and time consume process into a smart , simple and easy task . Location Identification - Searches , locate and identify the whereabouts of tag-embedded asset in real time Fast Inventory - Multiple item process do not require line of sight because asset with RFID tag be easily detect by a fixed or portable RFID reader - Stocktaking and audit make easy with a lightweight ergonomic design handheld reader Asset Movement Tracking - Track and trace those asset in transfer automatically - Full history of asset movement record Asset Information Retrieval - Clear indication of asset status e.g . on loan , return or subject to disposal - Access of data with role-based control and account authentication Asset Security Control - Sends out alert with RF Guard and RF Track in case of unauthorised asset transfer Reporting - Detailed report and insight provide real-time , transparent information to authorize user and management in daily operation Key Benefits : - Highly accurate and very efficient in asset control and management - Thorough and secure asset protection to minimize theft or misplacement - Streamlined operation , optimize work-flow and synchronized information give more transparency and high visibility in asset life cycle management - Better asset management enhance utilization of space and make the best use of resource - Increased automation reduces manual process , paper work and human error

Solution Description: We be Litbulb ( www.litbulb.com ) a HK startup . Our mobile tool help people communicate good at work , between team , between department . We want to address the issue of too many email , too many chatroom , employee today have to deal with too much noise , and this have a negative impact to employee engagement and internal collaboration . Our mobile tool fix this by let you know what 's important and what 's noise , so we can focus our brain only on the thing that matter and feel more accomplished at work . Our tool also reward those that contribute value-add to their colleague , create a culture of Helping Others Win . Use it to collaborate , share knowledge , innovate , and build together a good Hong Kong .

Use Case: We believe that the best public servant be those that help each other with combined expertise and knowledge . According to a number of employee engagement survey ( most recently Mercer 2018 ) employee engagement in Hong Kong be show a steady decline , result in poor cross-functional collaboration . Current communication overload at work ( emails+chatrooms+notifications+alerts ) be not foster more collaboration but frustration . We believe we need to help employee simplify . Litbulb connect people with idea internally , each team have its own profile and can let others know their top 3 priority , to receive idea and knowledge from others . A league table show the best contributor and idea to everyone for inspiration . It be also a great tool for management to identify the best talent in their department . The benefit be a more engaged workforce , share idea to create good service for the public . The mobile tool be free for 3 month , and after that HKD15 per user per month ( you do n't need an entire department to use , you can have a small group of people ) .

Solution Description: In today 's digital age , the information and record generate on the Internet have increase significantly.However , because the data be centrally manage by a few unit , the data can easily be conceal and tamper with , result in information asymmetry.Blockchain , as a distributed ledger technology , have the characteristic of non-tampering and can be use as a database to record and store data.Once the information be store in the ledger of the blockchain , it can not be arbitrarily change or delete by anyone.The two most widely use mainstream blockchain technology include Ethereum and Hyperledger , which can be use as a public chain or a private chain.In response to project need , we can use Ethereum or Hyperledger as the foundation , and build smart contract on the blockchain to store data on the blockchain.Smart contract on the blockchain have the characteristic of transparency , decentralization , and automation , and can provide unique solution accord to different application scenario .

Use Case: The application level of blockchain technology be very extensive and can be apply in all link of public services.Since the data store in the blockchain be non-tamperable , the blockchain can be use as a database to record and store true information.For example , the government can store public data , such as land record , travel warning , food safety information , and company registration data , in a distributed account book on the blockchain , and cooperate with application to notify the public and facilitate user to query various type of information.The development of smart contract and application on the blockchain can automate the operation process , reduce departmental manpower , and save operating cost .

Solution Name (Eng): SparkXIO Smart Car Park Management System
Solution Description: 1 . SparkX Stud , a new generation IoT sensor from PRODIGY detect `` Vehicle Occupancy '' in car park . The floor mount sensor , sense the change in geo-magnetic field around it to detect the presence of a vehicle in a car park bay . The sensor communicate the occupancy data , via long range wireless network standard LoRa and NBiOT . 2 . SparXIO system - the cloud base smart park solution from PRODIGY host on AWS , provide building owner a complete management device management . 3 . SparkXIO Mobile App provide user real time access to the car park status with geo-location both outdoor and indoor car park bay .
Application Areas:
City Management
Commerce and Industry
Development
Housing
Infrastructure
Transport
Technologies Used:
Cloud Computing
Data Analytics
Internet of Things (IoT)
Mobile Technologies
Use Case: Primary application of SparkX Stud as a vehicle occupancy sensor be to detect presence of an automotive in park bay . On detection of an automotive , the SparkX Stud , communicate the parking bay status change , via standard Long Range Wireless communication channel LoRa / NBIOT to Prodigy™ dedicated cloud server . Using SPARKXIO™ Mobile Apps connect to the cloud server , driver be able to access the real time status of park sensor locate across the city and efficiently plan their travel .

Solution Name (Eng): Pyxis - The Internet of Things(IoT) Solution for Construction 2.0 and Beyond
Solution Name (TC): Pyxis - 可廣泛應用的建築業2.0物聯網科技
Company Name (Tc): 創新建築科技有限公司
Solution Description: Pyxis service system be an Internet of Things ( IoT ) base solution target primarily the civil engineering and construction industry . Real time monitoring of activity at construction site utilize sensor connect to the system ensure site safety for worker and quality of work . Trustworthiness of report data can be greatly increase by machine to machine handle process . Users can configure different level of safety warning signal accord to job specific requirement in addition to a default ( alert , alarm and action ) 3A system for individual sensor . If any of the measured reading reach the trigger level , warn signal will be send to user ’ receive device , ( include mobile phone , smart watch or PCs ) , to notify them . Accordingly , Pyxis can detect unsafe condition at the very early stage and thus act as a shield to protect worker from be injure due to unforeseeable factor . Besides construction application , Pyxis can provide management related solution to a wide variety of city management challenge by the afore-mentioned approach .
Application Areas:
City Management
Environment
Housing
Infrastructure
Civil Engineering,Construction,Facility Management
Technologies Used:
Blockchain
Cloud Computing
Data Analytics
Internet of Things (IoT)
Mobile Technologies
Use Case: Pyxis be highly effective in enhance worker ’ safety at work site and improve work quality as well . It be capable to detect change happen in structure and site condition that be unnoticeable to naked eye and immediately notify you base on the pre-set 3A configuration . Sensors for Pyxis can run 24/7 non-stop , so you do not need to worry about lose a single piece of information even outside work hour . With the big set of collected data , potential safety issue at construction site can be identify at the very early stage . The system also generate PDF report automatically ( daily ) , or on-request any time , to save your time in consolidate the collect data . Obviously , early detection of change can result in high standard and good quality of work to be deliver . We have many type and a wide range of IoT sensor which include : inclination sensor , water depth sensor , force sensor , vibration sensor , settlement sensor and environmental sensor . They be applicable in many area of construction and civil engineering work . For example : • Tilt monitoring of building , pile and infrastructure • Underground water table level monitoring when foundation work be in progress • Force monitoring of temporary support use in demolition , falsework for concrete , ELS work and old building stabilization during construction • Slope monitoring • Indoor air quality monitoring We understand that different project may have their specific need . Apart from standard sensor package , we also can offer full customization to suit your need . We can provide turn-key customized hardware , firmware , and software comprehensive solution to our client in very short period of time by our local team in Hong Kong . Pyxis have adopt a machine to machine and directly machine to user design principle . Use Case: In government–whether local or federal–the pressure to provide fast insight on your agency ’ s program rest squarely on your team ’ s shoulder . Although we live and work in a world with an overabundance of data , quick access to information and insight can be impossible if you struggle with a lack of resource , budget , and legacy system . Below , three common data challenge in government be address with use case in public service and the benefit attain with Alteryx . LIMITED BUDGETS AND RESOURCES Public sector organization be often lean operation , and both monetary and headcount resource be precious . There ’ s no shortage of data , but a lack of resource make the ability to access and combine data from various source , department , agency , and third party a constant challenge . Highly train data scientist who can perform advanced analysis be often unaffordable for public sector—which mean government organization must empower analyst with the tool to do more . When John Matyasovsky Jr. , a Database Manager and Systems Analyst for the Fifth Judicial District of Pennsylvania , be introduce to the modern self-service analytics platform Alteryx , the positive effect of the platform be immediate . With a two-week free trial , John be able to create an XML parsing process that normally would ’ ve take month to build . “ It be estimate that the free trial alone pay for the license investment , ” he say THE STATUS QUO Nothing be more damaging to innovation than “ the way we ’ ve always do things. ” Whether the status quo be drive by mindset or legacy system , government agency that can streamline and automate report generation and analysis will not only be more effective , they ’ ll also liberate analyst to spend more time deliver unique insight instead of chase their tail . Because of built-in legacy system , the US Patent and Trademark Office ( USTPO ) be force to use legacy tool like COBOL program . Antiquated system like COBOL be slow-moving and cumbersome , negatively impact in the office ’ s ability to provide timely analysis . The department need a system of operating and perform analytics that could accommodate , support , and respond to internal stakeholder need as they evolve . In other word , they need to shift from static , ancient system to a flexible , modern approach . With Alteryx , analyst within the Trademarks office can easily extract data use business-friendly intelligence and analytic tool to manage both routine and ad hoc request , like trademark application filing , prosecution , examination , registration , post-registration process , and reporting . “ No one be more qualified to work with our data set than us , ” say James Nosal , Program Analyst . “ Data that use to be manually manipulate within Microsoft Excel in hour or day , be now blend , in second , with Alteryx. ” The Trademarks office also use Alteryx as an ETL tool to extract data on a nightly schedule . Data go from a legacy transactional system and be automatically load into an optimize data model design specifically to support analytical effort . ( https : //community.alteryx.com/t5/Alteryx-Use-Cases/Data-Analytics-Federal-Agency-and-the-Thirty-Year-Old-Legacy/ta-p/162629 ) ON-TIME ACTIONABLE INSIGHTS A major issue with analytics be report lag—by the time you understand what ’ s happen , everything have change , and the data be no longer relevant . Increasing the speed , accuracy , and comprehensiveness of data analysis be critical to drive your agency ’ s future . Following Hurricanes Irma and Maria , the Federal Emergency Management Agency ( FEMA ) need to rapidly assess damage to a minimum of 130,000 structure in Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands . Extremely challenging condition like block roadway and landslide make traditional field assessment slow and difficult . Additionally , the assessment have to include the effect of combined wind and flood damage from two distinct , but consecutive hurricane . After the storm , team visit 600+ structure and take detailed measurement to serve as training data for a damage model ; and analytic team build an Alteryx workflow blending over a dozen GIS and tabular data set to serve as predictive variable . The model be update and revise daily to improve the quality of the prediction . This project help over 100,000 people get on the road to recovery more quickly . It clear a significant hurtle for them as far as rebuild their structure and it give the community information that they really need to start reconstruction . They evaluate about 146,000 structure , of which about 30,000 of need an on-the-ground inspection . The net result be that only about 21 % of the total need further inspection , which save ten of million of dollar in the response effort . It also save year in term of the amount of time that it will take to recover in some of those community . It be all make possible because of what they be able to do with Alteryx . ( https : //community.alteryx.com/t5/Alteryx-Use-Cases/Alteryx-for-Disaster-Relief-Hurricanes-Irma-and-Maria/ta-p/313523 )

Solution Description: Ziizau be a mobile application that optimize route design , find the short travel route . The application provide the user an interactive interface for route planning by a detailed map view . Routes be define by select location on the map , they be call waypoints . The waypoints can be add manually or automatically by import them from a data file . One of the waypoints be designate as the starting location for the route . Route optimization be base on find the short path regard the travel distance that connect all the waypoints . The optimization process be do in second or less and it take into account natural obstacle ( for example river or island ) . The result be draw on the map by connected waypoints as the short route . Besides the optimized route , more information be available like the route length , duration or the actual coordinate of the route waypoints . Ziizau application can be easily modify to meet the required service need : - The input of the route information can be automate . Data can be take from an already exist database or import from mobile system . GPS data can be convert into route waypoints . - Analytics can be apply on the database in order to label waypoints with meta data that help the optimization process to make more accurate decision . - Waypoints can be define by manual location selection , address search or lat/lon coordinate input . - Additional information can be add to each waypoint ( for example extra time spend at the location ) and it will be take into account at the optimization process . - Meta data / label can be attach to waypoints that will serve as visualization aid , they can be show on the map view . - The route optimization process can be adjust for the short travel distance or for the fast travel time , also the maximum number of optimizable waypoints can be increase . - Waypoints along with their optimized route can be store into the system , organize into different category . The stored data / result can be quickly load by selection from list . - Data export can be add for the select or all the optimize route and their relevant information . - Integration with other system through web service call and / or move the system into cloud .
Application Areas:
Commerce and Industry
Infrastructure
Transport
Technologies Used:
Cloud Computing
Data Analytics
Machine Learning
Mobile Technologies
Predictive Analytics
Use Case: The Ziizau application can be useful in many scenario . Primary application can be route optimization for mail delivery in the city . It can help find the short route include travel distance or fast delivery time . Complete route planning process can be automate and enhance with self-learning capability . In case there be an already exist database with location and other meta data , by use various method , prediction can be make and new information can be produce that help the optimization process . Optimization can be more accurate in case , when : - Locations be label with weight for different time frame - Locations have adjust or variable time or travel distance data - Locations can be enable / disable - Location group can be create to ease rule application on them - Measured data about optimized route can be use as feedback for future re-optimizations Areas of possible usage , scenario that can benefit from route optimization : - Mail / good delivery - Workforce transportation - Logistics - City transportation system optimization

Solution Description: We be an AI company with special focus on natural language processing ( NLP ) and deep learning . Since found in 2016 , we have have multiple chatbot project experience for over 100 key account cover finance , telecom , internet , utility and other industry . Our client include China Merchants Bank , PICC , Futu Securities , DiDi , China Mobile , Ctrip , etc . We can deploy our service via web page ( H5 ) , App , Wechat , Whatsapp and other common instant messenger . The chatbot can cover general FAQ , task completion and knowledge-based inquiry . Our chatbot can understand user ' real intent , answer the question , generate a work order , and guide the user to complete a task/request step by step ( i.e . a maintenance request ) via conversational UI .
