Solution Name (Eng): Mobility Mesh Wi-Fi Application for Smart City
Solution Name (TC): 移動式多跳Wi-Fi 在智慧城市的應用
Solution Description: 1 . 4G/LTE mesh Wi-Fi access point : By instal our 4G/LTE equip mobility mesh access point , a large-scale Mesh Wi-Fi network can be easily build in outdoor area and enable all associate Wi-Fi client connect to network/internet by both wire and 4G/LTE access . Rooted at our wireless research on distributed channel and fast routing optimization , instant and dynamic path change achieves many fold improvement in Wi-Fi coverage while maintain high throughput under unpredictable and harsh wireless environment . Thanks to the three-radios design , throughput degrade be much minimize during multiple hopping . Battery power outdoor mesh access point with built-in antenna can easily extend the Wi-Fi coverage anytime to extra location where Wi-Fi connection be request . In addition to basic configuration and monitoring feature , other advance one like Wi-Fi coverage site survey , social login , captive portal , land page and AI channel optimization be also provide in our enterprise grade cloud management server . 4G mesh Wi-Fi access point help in build up Wi-Fi network in area where optic fiber cabling be costly or difficult . This solution can be apply in free Wi-Fi hotspot at smart lamppost in Hong Kong so as to reduce the investment cost and simplify the installation . 2 . Multi-profiles 4G/Wi-Fi Ethernet adapter : At large outdoor operate area like container port and landfill site where 4G cellular signal be only partly cover , our unique multi-profiles 4G/Wi-Fi Ethernet adapter allow vehicular device to use both Wi-Fi and 4G/LTE for data communication such as real-time two-way message communication or GPS location reporting . Client device can seamless shift between Wi-Fi and 4G/LTE connection for reliable communication when 4G/LTE be too weak to connect . The Wi-Fi coverage can be provide by use 4G/LTE mesh Wi-Fi access point . Temporary station with high gain LTE antenna can be build in location where LTE signal be good and provide Wi-Fi signal for area where LTE signal can not reach . This solution can be apply for client device that need real time data communication in remote area of Hong Kong that 4G/LTE coverage be marginal such as landfill site and new development zone . 3 . Multilingual docent in Wi-Fi Access Point It be an intelligent Access Point special design for multimedia multicasting . Multilingual multimedia be preloaded in the Access Point and can be update whenever there be 4G/LTE access to the server . Solution Description: Traditional flow monitoring provide a high-level view of network communication by report the address , port , and byte and packet count of a flow . In addition , intraflow metadata , or information about event that occur inside of a flow , can be collect , store , and analyze within a flow monitoring framework . This data be especially valuable when traffic be encrypt , because deep-packet inspection be no longer viable . This enhance intraflow metadata be derive by use new type of data element or telemetry that be independent of protocol detail , such as the length and arrival time of message within a flow . These data element have the attractive property of apply equally well to both encrypt and unencrypted flow . Using these data element or enhance intraflow telemetry to identify malware communication in encrypted traffic mean Cisco® Encrypted Traffic Analytics can maintain the integrity of the encrypt flow without the need for bulk decryption . Encrypted Traffic Analytics focus on identify malware communication in encrypted traffic through passive monitoring , the extraction of relevant data element , and a combination of behavioral modeling and machine learn with cloud-based global visibility . Transport Layer Security ( TLS ) be a cryptographic protocol that provide privacy for application . TLS be usually implement on top of common protocol such as HTTP for web browsing or Simple Mail Transfer Protocol ( SMTP ) for email . HTTPS be the use of TLS over HTTP . This be the most popular way of secure communication between a web server and client and be support by most major web server . Encrypted Traffic Analytics extract four main data element : The initial data packet , the sequence of packet length and time , the byte distribution , and TLS-specific feature . Cisco ’ s unique Application-Specific Integrated Circuit ( ASIC ) architecture provide the ability to extract these data element without slow down the data network .

Solution Description: Our VR training system can provide immersive and actual-feeling for user to understand different training detail . In particular , for some special condition such as scenario of accident ( e.g . fire accident , poisonous liquid leakage or short-circuit ) and dangerous or prohibit area ( e.g . custom area ) , it be difficult to provide training for officers/technicians . With our VR training solution , we can 1:1 simulate the actual environment and specific scenario for trainee . In addition , we can collect data of user movement , decision making and trainee information throughout the training . With those data , we can provide data analysis for analyze trainee 's behavior and feedback to trainer to pinpoint the area of improvement . The result report can be store on cloud server and to be review through browser and mobile platform ( iOS & Android ) . Currently , our solution have help various government department and large enterprise for their staff training and safety/precaution education .

Solution Name (Eng): AppProtect+ (RASP) / YESsafe Zero Login (OTP) / AccessMatrix Universal Sign-On (SSO)
Solution Description: i-Sprint be found in Year 2000 by a former IT & Security team of CitiBank ; and be serve world 's tier-1 bank and a number of financial institution with Identity , Credential and Access Management solution that be highly adaptable to comply with requirement from monetary authority in different country . 1 ) AppProtect+ be a RASP solution which proactively protect mobile apps against various risk and attack by block attack in real-time include Strandhogg , which can be a critical loophole for Android OS . It can prevent passive attack ( like reverse engineering , repackaging and source code modification ) , and respond by take necessary measure if real-time attack be detect during app run , allow mobile apps to run securely even on highly infect smart device . 2 ) YESsafe Zero Login be a new generation all-in-one mobile security token use One Time Password ( OTP ) and PKI / Digital Certificate technology that support different type of authenticator : e.g . YESsafe OTP , FIDO , 1FA , AD/LDAP…etc . for strong authentication and transaction authorization . The solution strengthen transaction sign experience with non-repudiation and data integrity protection , and it leverage the security protection of mobile device with advanced time-to-market feature that also consider the ease of use . 3 ) AccessMatrix Universal Sign-On ( USO ) be a non-intrusive security solution for organization to achieve single sign-on to web , desktop , java and host base application without the cost and risk of application-level programming . USO have be integrate with most of the lead portal server to provide single sign-on capability . USO 's facility for auto-installation , auto-configuration and self- service greatly simplify deployment and reduce maintenance effort . The central security server store the user ’ security- related property for each application . Both Zero Login and USO solution be build on the comprehensive and versatile Universal Authentication Server ( UAS ) which enable organization to centralize and manage all its authentication scheme in a single unified platform . It also lower the integration and operational cost with a common set of APIs while on the same backend .

Solution Name (Eng): An Intelligent Solution for Automatic Processing and Chasing of Documents
Solution Name (TC): 自動處理和追收文件的智慧解決方案
Company Name (Eng): Hong Kong Synergy Software Company Limited
Solution Description: The Form-World® database be a relational “ form ” database . It can be apply to document management system , where paper document be convert into electronic form for storage and further processing . Using the Form-World Document Management System require no change to your current document management process . You can directly convert your hard copy to the Form-World document , maintain the same user interface ( UI ) . General clerk can handle the document very easily . Organizations have no need to invest on heavy capital equipment . The follow pain point can be solve easily : - • Information Capture Users can define on the paper document their area of interest . The Data Extraction Module will locate the area , recognize the character , extract the relevant information and fee the information to the Form-World Document Management System . ( The Data Extraction Module be integrate with an OCR tool . ) The Data Extraction Module can also read relevant information from an XFA file . • Content Verification Rules can be set up such that data field be restrict to user-defined type , format , data range and order of input . Users will be remind to enter data correctly if these rule be violate . Field Validity Check • Chase Reminders The Form-World Document Management System integrate a workflow control mechanism . A workflow be set up to track and control how multiple user act on a document . These action can be submission , review , approval , processing , etc . The system will issue reminder , by e-mails or pop-up notification , to user who be suppose to act on a step of the workflow . The workflow can proceed to the next step only upon completion of the current step . This will automate the document chase process . Documents can be submit via ( 1 ) the client computer or ( 2 ) a browser , the link to which can be attach to the reminder e-mail . • Input/Output Variety of input document can be ( 1 ) Paper document ( 2 ) PDF document ( 3 ) JPEG document ( 4 ) PNG document ( 5 ) XFA document , etc . The Form-World Document Management System store information in various format such as text , number , image or video , as desire . It also provide an interface to export data to Excel or other SQL database . • Activity Log The system maintain a log of all user activity . • Statistical Analyses The system be equip with tool for statistical analysis and reporting purpose .
Application Areas:
Broadcasting
City Management
Climate and Weather
Commerce and Industry
Development
Education
Employment and Labour
Environment
Finance
Food
Health
Housing
Infrastructure
Law and Security
Population
Recreation and Culture
Social Welfare
Transport
Technologies Used: 3rd generation database
Use Case: The Form-World-based Document Management System be expect to bring great benefit to business , academia and the public sector , in particular those organization who maintain paper record or their scanned image pass down from decade . It will greatly simplify organization ’ paperless transformation . It can also help set up a control mechanism in the deployment of paperless document management . • Release space that would otherwise be use for physical document storage . • Drastically reduce disk storage capacity requirement . • Tremendously speed up information retrieval . • Efficiency improvement by ~70 % .

Solution Name (Eng): Technology of independent intellectual property identity authentication and tracking of close contacts of patients to assist in epidemic prevention and control and return to work
Solution Name (TC): 為疫情防控及復工復產提供助力的自主知識產權身份認證及追蹤確診患者近距離接觸人士的技術
Company Name (Tc): 香港靠譜網路科技有限公司
Solution Description: This program provide two technical service for the current epidemic prevention and control , such as track the people who have be in close contact with the confirmed patient , and the independent intellectual property identity authentication technology that can solve the hidden danger cause by the current lack of identity authentication ; ifThe above-mentioned technology can be effectively apply and will be able to effectively prevent and control the spread of the epidemic without loophole , and provide assistance for the implementation of the resumption of work and production .
Application Areas:
Health
當前新冠病毒的疫情防控、企業的復工復產
Technologies Used:
Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Data Analytics
Use Case: 1 . Follow up close contact of the confirmed patient : This technology be a mobile APP service that can record the people who have be in close contact with the user within 28 day ( provide that both party need to use the APP service ) . The user need to install the company ’ s APP ( or use other APP application that integrate the SDK of this service ) and turn on the Bluetooth of the mobile phone . When the user stand about two meter away and be in contact for several minute , the APP service will exchange data via Bluetooth Record information about contact . This mean that if a user be diagnose with an illness , he can track people who have have close contact with him through the record of this function , even if the user can not accurately recall his whereabouts . The service can be put into use immediately , and in the server zero user privacy technology of the company 's independent intellectual property right , any product and service of the company will not involve user ' private information . If this function be use by everyone , combine with another identity authentication technology of our company ( exclude all identity forgery and fraudulent use ) , it will be able to accurately track every person who have be in contact with the patient , effectively control the spread of the epidemic , and help company To provide assistance for the resumption of work and production . 2 . Identity authentication technology base on social relation : Current identity authentication method can not simply and effectively eliminate fraudulent use of identity ( factor such as authentication cost , high threshold , etc. ) . For example , during the epidemic , the community 's registration of visitor , registration in public place , etc. , be difficult to prevent fraud . The hidden danger of use identity registration ; at the same time , there be a lack of identity authentication method for foreigner . The identity authentication technology of the company ’ s independent intellectual property right be different from the verification mechanism of `` personal identification combine with one '' because password , short message , face , and ID card can all be steal or voluntarily use for fraud . However , it can not be use by others . Therefore , in this social relationship-based identity authentication , each user have only one identity , there be no multiple identity , and only the person can log in and can not be fraudulently use . At the same time , social relation ( identify acquaintance ) have no cognitive threshold for people of almost any age and country . This identity authentication technology can be apply to the three major difficulty in epidemic prevention and control , such as community entry and exit management , entry and exit management of epidemic area , home isolation management , etc. , through a simple and effective identity authentication method , completely exclude visitor from fraudulent use in the community Identity security risk , effective registration of the whereabouts of immigrant ( include foreigner ) , and an effective monitoring method for home self-isolation . How to use the above service : 1 . Our company have develop an SDK with the above function , which can be integrate and use in other APP application . For example , in mainland China , the city public service application `` Aiguangxi APP '' in Guangxi Province be dock with our SDK . 2 . You can use the `` True Reliable '' APP of our product to use the above functional service . The above two method can be quickly put into use .

If this function be use by everyone , combine with another identity authentication technology of our company ( exclude all identity forgery and fraudulent use ) , it will be able to accurately track every person who have be in contact with the patient , effectively control the spread of the epidemic , and help company To provide assistance for the resumption of work and production . 2 . Identity authentication technology base on social relation : Current identity authentication method can not simply and effectively eliminate fraudulent use of identity ( factor such as authentication cost , high threshold , etc. ) . For example , during the epidemic , the community 's registration of visitor , registration in public place , etc. , be difficult to prevent fraud . The hidden danger of use identity registration ; at the same time , there be a lack of identity authentication method for foreigner . The identity authentication technology of the company ’ s independent intellectual property right be different from the verification mechanism of `` personal identification combine with one '' because password , short message , face , and ID card can all be steal or voluntarily use for fraud . However , it can not be use by others . Therefore , in this social relationship-based identity authentication , each user have only one identity , there be no multiple identity , and only the person can log in and can not be fraudulently use . At the same time , social relation ( identify acquaintance ) have no cognitive threshold for people of almost any age and country . This identity authentication technology can be apply to the three major difficulty in epidemic prevention and control , such as community entry and exit management , entry and exit management of epidemic area , home isolation management , etc. , through a simple and effective identity authentication method , completely exclude visitor from fraudulent use in the community Identity security risk , effective registration of the whereabouts of immigrant ( include foreigner ) , and an effective monitoring method for home self-isolation . How to use the above service : 1 . Our company have develop an SDK with the above function , which can be integrate and use in other APP application . For example , in mainland China , the city public service application `` Aiguangxi APP '' in Guangxi Province be dock with our SDK . 2 . You can use the `` True Reliable '' APP of our product to use the above functional service . The above two method can be quickly put into use .

Solution Description: This plan provide an implementation plan for the Hong Kong Financial Secretary 's policy of `` Distributing 10,000 Hong Kong Dollars to Permanent Residents of 18 Years and Over '' . It will be an extremely efficient and economical way to distribute 10,000 Hong Kong dollar through online banking.However , the current mainstream online identity authentication method have shortcoming , it be difficult to verify identity simply and effectively , and can not completely eliminate the security risk of identity fraud ; therefore , our company recommend an identity authentication technology with independent intellectual property right to effectively solve the current identity authentication deficiencies.Provide assistance for the implementation of the policy !

Use Case: Currently , Hong Kong ’ s new fiscal year plan to issue 10,000 Hong Kong dollar per person to permanent resident age 18 or above . It be undoubtedly one of the most efficient method to implement the payment through online banking , but this method rely heavily on the reliability of online identity verification . If there be a loophole , it will cause the hidden danger of be steal by others and receive subsidy by false identity . At present , the mainstream online identity verification method such as account password , mobile phone SMS , ID card , face and other verification have the possibility of be steal and fraudulently use . Therefore , if the issuance be implement through online banking , it will face how to ensure `` The current user applying for the subsidy have the same identity as the bank account holder '' . The identity verification technology with independent intellectual property right of the company have three characteristic that can perfectly solve this difficulty , and can ensure that every verify user have only one identity ; ensure that only the account holder ( registrant ) can log in to his account ; In term of universality , it be suitable for almost any age group and race ; and combine with another independent intellectual property right of the company 's server zero user privacy technology , it can complete verification under the premise of ensure user privacy . implementation plan : Integrate our company ’ s identity verification SDK ( or call our company ’ s APP product ) into the bank APP designate by the government to apply for subsidy . When resident use the bank ’ s APP to submit subsidy application , the identity verification provide by our company will be perform . If the verification be pass , It mean that the current user be the holder of the bank account and can directly issue subsidy to the bank account . ( This authentication require mutual recognition with friend , so the user 's acquaintance and friend ( mobile phone contact ) also need to be register as user of the bank APP . )

Solution Description: Limits COVID19 spread while allow normal economic and citizen day-to-day activity 1 ) Why COVID-19 be spread fast ? The big reason why Coronavirus be so easy to spread in the community be that infected person have an incubation period of about 14 day , and there be no obvious surface symptom . Many people do not know if they have be in contact with incubator . If the use of block strategy such as closing school , close in-door gym. , close movie theater , & close the border , it can only be solve the problem in the short term . In the longer-term , it not only affect the normal life of citizen but also cause huge economic loss . 2 ) The Mathematical Model of Coronavirus Spreading Mathematically , assume the infection rate be 2 % and the average size of people gather in the public area be 600 people . If the community do nothing to identify the incubator and alert them not to enter public area , in 84 day , the total infected people can grow to 3 million . If we can block 80 % of incubator , the infected number can be reduce drastically to less than 1,000 . 3 ) Our System be base on the Mathematical Model The most effective way to implement the mathematical model be to use the smartphone registration app and also to install dedicated terminal in public place such as a library , cinema , school , and gym to record where and when the citizen have visit . When a person be report as virus-infected by medical authority , the system immediately put all person who appear in the same place at the same time as the confirmed patient into an Alert list and transmit it to all terminal . This system give a friendly alert to potential incubator when they be enter public area This be not a user track system !
Application Areas:
Education
Health
Recreation and Culture
Technologies Used:
Data Analytics
Mobile Technologies
Use Case: Dedicated terminal in public place such as a library , school , gym , and those government department open to the general public . By screen of possible infected people , it make public place be a safe place to visit . Each terminal cost HK $ 2,000 and there be no installation require as the terminal be battery operated and support WiFi/4G network .

Collaborative learning can also effectively solve learn differences.Whether in traditional classroom or remote teaching , the Una platform can also maintain and improve the quality of teach . 2 ) Education center ( such as training center and tutorial center ) : Most of the offline teaching activity have be terminate due to the epidemic , and the education center have drastically reduce their income , affect their normal operations.If the education center use the Una platform , the company can provide technical support to enable the education center to master the technology and implement effective online remote teaching , and start class and enroll student .

Solution Name (Eng): NoQ E Form registration and quota distribution for massive traffic
Solution Description: NoQ offer an innovative way to record E-form entry that expect ten of thousand or even million of visitor in a short period of time . It have a built-in anti-bot function to avoid DDoS attack . The solution be base on the late cloud technology and it be well proven in many scenario include mask sale or free mask distribution during the COVID-19 epidemic situation . The traditional public facing online system that require user to input data always fail to operate due to the overwhelming number of visitor . Server failures contribute a very negative image to the public and generate negative medium coverage . To all kind of public face registration system , especially when the registration be first-come-first-serve , improve the performance of the system be critical to service level and public relation concern .
Application Areas:
Commerce and Industry
Recreation and Culture
Social Welfare
Technologies Used:
Cloud Computing
Mobile Technologies
Use Case: An efficient E-form system could improve the user experience . Big scale lucky draw like Hong Kong New Year Countdown Lucky Draw , cash handout to general citizen , book badminton court through Leisure Link be some of the best use case . The solution allow million of visitor to fill in E-form to register at the same time , then the visitor will immediately receive a confirmation within second after check if the quota be available . The traditional way might require a very powerful server and a very fast database which be very expensive and difficult to serve million class traffic . Only a fully distribute , cloud-native solution can eliminate the chance for Denial of Service due to sudden heavy traffic . The solution ’ s cost be calculate per quota , in our previous experience for sell mask , for example , if there be 100,000 quota available , the pricing model would be 100,000 * ( HKD0.x-HKD2.0 ) depend on various factor . No extra ongoing maintenance and host cost . Flexible pricing model could be make upon discussion . The public could have a fair and fast environment to compete without bot , spend less time queue online for registration .

Solution Description: The WCL RPA solution be an automation tool that can be use to automate the manual process and automate repetitive matching process for improvement of process accuracy and operation efficiency . With the enhanced system , the whole process can be shorten with boosted efficiency and increase match rate . It be particularly suitable to handle the automation of exist workflow in handle electronic application and in validate the receive data against specific source of the internet , search for relevant market information from various website to support application assessment , and inputting the collect information into the system in a pre-defined format . The end result be improvement in efficiency and effectiveness for those manual process that be repetitive , time consuming and prone to error .
Application Areas:
Commerce and Industry
Law and Security
Technologies Used: Robotic Process Automation
Use Case: REFERENCE # 1 : Country of Brazil automate Business Intelligence process use the RPA Solution CASE HIGHLIGHTS : PROFILED ORGANIZATION : Ministry of Economy and Finance of Brazil - Brasilia . CHALLENGES : Gathering data from several repository and report system , the Treasury Bureau use an involved process to distribute daily , critical report for various department . The Brazil 's government need a way to automate and improve the end-to-end process of report financial data . SOLUTION : After research several automation alternative , the Ministry select the RPA solution to tie together the disparate source of data and create cohesive report that be send to the top level of government on a daily basis . BENEFITS : The Brazilian government receive timely information on the daily financial marker and status of the country , provide improved decision making in a volatile global economy while save vast amount of money in streamlined process , improve productivity , and reduce data entry and reporting error . REFERENCE # 2 : San Diego County - Health and Human Services Agency CASE HIGHLIGHTS : PROFILED ORGANIZATION : The Health and Human Services Agency of the San Diego County Government provide various health and social service to citizen . The administration of its various public assistance program require a manually intensive process of verification use two large and different application . CHALLENGES : Automating the complex , time consume verification process that utilize a legacy application , a document management system and a host of other process requirement . SOLUTION : A non-invasive process be design utilize the front-end of both application and provide a system for agent to complete all verification requirement with the press of a single hot-key . Solution Description: 1 ) Virtual Secure Element : Building on the industry-leading patented V-OS Virtual Secure Element , V-Key have develop a highly secure framework that integrate with mobile apps to secure them against advanced persistent threat , trojan , and rootkits . 2 ) Protection with Threat Intelligence : V-OS secures sensitive processing and data , ensure app integrity when deployed , and safeguard user privacy even if the device be lose or compromise . - Device integrity check for malware - File system integrity check to detect backdoor and rootkits - App integrity check against tamper - Network integrity check against MITM attack on Data-in-Transit - Secure Cryptographic function for both Data-at-Rest and Data-in-Use - Secure Anti-Fraud Keyboard 3 ) Threat Intelligence Security Management : Designed as the Mobile Threat Command and Control system , enterprise can configure security policy to manage attack response and control . - Collect Real-time App Threats - OTA Policy Updates - Extensive RESTful web service - Integrate easily with MDMs , SIEMs , and other Threat Analytic Engines for seamless management

Use Case: 1 ) High banking/military grade Mobile App Security Solution V-OS Application Protection deploy multi-layered security mechanism to help secure the mobile application . The V-OS and V-OS App Protection layer make it extremely difficult for an attacker to gain access to the critical data , even with full access to the mobile phone . We be able to do this because the interaction of the secured virtual machine model and the dynamic protection mechanism maintains control over the mobile environment and deny an attacker the ability to control the virtual machine execution flow for analysis . V-OS secures sensitive processing and data , ensure app integrity when deployed , and safeguard user privacy even if the device be lose or compromise . 2 ) Robust and also provide Software-As-A-Service for rapid deployment if need . With V-OS Cloud , customer can deploy the same powerful V-OS App Protection and V-OS Smart Token solution without additional V-Key server software on premise . This reduce total cost of ownership , shortens time to value , and simplifies customer support .

Solution Name (Eng): One card e-payment solution for GBA(Guangdong-hong kong-Macao Greater Bay area)
Solution Name (TC): 粵港澳大灣區移動電子支付，智慧壹卡通產品方案
Solution Description: The development of innovation and technology and the promotion of smart city construction be one of the priority of the current government . Government department be implement more than 70 smart city measure at full speed , cover `` smart travel '' , `` smart life '' , `` smart environment '' , and `` smart citizen '' , `` Smart Government '' and `` Smart Economy '' . The Innovation and Technology Bureau also encourage the industry to develop more innovative application to benefit the people and business . This plan call for the government to step up the promotion of the `` financial all-in-one card '' electronic wallet ( account or card ) compatible with mainland payment in Hong Kong . 1 . The Guangzhou University Town Card Company under our company undertake the key project of Guangdong Province-the University Town Card Project in 2004 . The core of the project be to build a card issuing system for college student ’ financial account and electronic ID card . The project be approve by the People ’ s Bank of China and China UnionPay . Guide major bank to participate in joint venture . Cards and financial account issue by the company can be use in the acceptance environment of UnionPay major commercial bank in Mainland China , Hong Kong and other place without barrier . 2 . In response to the need of Hong Kong resident to pay back to the mainland , our company propose to issue this ( card ) financial account in Hong Kong to gain the right to build autonomy . Hong Kong resident and foreigner who travel to and from China through Hong Kong , travel , business , or live back to the mainland with the card Obstacles to use . Taking into account the reality of social event in Hong Kong , our company plan to adjust the plan to copy the entire card issuance system in the Mainland to Hong Kong , and store private data in Hong Kong 's local banking and financial technology institution , and accept The financial management department of the SAR government may also consider cooperate with government-designated agency to conduct precise service under the guidance of the Housing Authority and the Education Bureau . Social public service be likely to involve infringement of privacy . Government FinTech precision service be bind and protect by the content of the Personal Data ( Privacy ) Ordinance , Chapter 486 of the Laws of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region . 3 . The account can be issue with electronic card ( virtual card ) or physical card , and online and remote account opening , without the need for bank counter , be convenient and quick . The account meet the standard of the People 's Bank of China and can be bind to the three major mobile payment system in Mainland China , UnionPay Cloud QuickPass , Tencent WeChat Pay , and Alipay Pay . 4 . The account ( card ) be jointly issue with a local bank in Hong Kong , use the 1+1 model , one local bank card + one general account ( card ) in the Mainland , the account be bind to the local bank card , and the account fund be transfer by the bound bank card , The account amount be freely control by the cardholder , and the amount be automatically deduct when consumption . 5 . Consumption adopt the method of tap the card and scan the code on the mobile phone , and can also adopt the mobile payment method such as apple pay or Samsung pay , which conform to the current mainstream payment mode .
Application Areas:
City Management
Commerce and Industry
Development
Education
Finance
Housing
Infrastructure
Social Welfare
Transport
Technologies Used:
Blockchain
Data Analytics
Internet of Things (IoT)
Use Case: 1 . The University Town All-in-One Card have be implement in 2004 for fifteen year and have set an example for the promotion and penetration of digital , information , and market-oriented innovative service and social governance in the education field and other field . In order to promote the application of financial IC card in the industry and expand the application scenario of financial account in university town , with the approval of the People ’ s Bank of China and the guidance and support of the People ’ s Bank of China Guangzhou Branch , China UnionPay Guangdong Branch and relevant commercial bank establish This month , it jointly issue the country ’ s first industry-finance co-branded IC card , which pioneer the combination of industry information construction and financial technology service , and create a new model of one-card industry application combine with government public service . 2 . The financial all-in-one card integrate the function of identity authentication , electronic payment , and bank card . It can be use as an electronic identity certificate for library borrowing , education , hospital visit , community access control , public facility leasing , airport attendance , etc . ; with electronic payment function , it can be use in all payment terminal with the UnionPay logo in the country . 3 . The Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area Construction Leading Group meeting announce the `` 16 Project Favorable Hong Kong Measures '' , of which the second point mention `` support Hong Kong resident to conveniently use mobile electronic payment in the Mainland '' . It clearly propose measure to support the convenient use of mobile electronic payment by Hong Kong resident in the Mainland , which mean that in addition to the exist online payment , mobile payment by Hong Kong resident in the Mainland will be more popular , realize the smooth use of mobile phone for food , clothing , housing and transportation . 4 . With the opening of the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge and the Hong Kong section of the Guangzhou-Shenzhen-Hong Kong high-speed rail , the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area have accelerate the flow of personnel , material and other factor . Hong Kong people visit the Mainland to spend more and more , and even purchase real estate in the Mainland as a permanent residence . The daily life consumption bring by the land , child ’ s education in the Mainland , and the increase demand for the use of medical resource in the Mainland . The one-day living circle in the Greater Bay Area have be form . Our company plan to build a set of `` Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area Convenient Mobile Electronics '' in Hong Kong . `` Payment '' and relate mobile phone application . Applications include : transportation ticket service for Hong Kong and the Mainland , ticket sale for movie ticket and attraction , partial government payment , telephone charge and data recharge of various telecom operator , bus code , various direct bus between China and Hong Kong Convenient content such as ticket sale , Guangzhou-Shenzhen Railway seat inquiry , medical and health care , smart parking , payment in the education sector , and cross-border e-commerce service cover all aspect of Hong Kong people 's travel in the Mainland , life , clothing , housing and transportation .

Regarding the above-mentioned government plan , the following scheme that can save administrative cost and facilitate resource share be recommend : 1 . The company 's self-built and researched public service electronic online application platform for informatization in Hong Kong . Fintech precise service require guidance from the Bureau of Financial Affairs and the Treasury . We will provide our company as a third-party professional service company to intervene and jointly develop The people ’ s livelihood project optimization mechanism serve the citizen , focus on the need of major commercial bank to complete the data collection service function , the government education bureau and the housing bureau jointly collect specific information , and perform data proofread on the receive data with the government public information platform to improve data information The accuracy of the collection can be quickly complete through the mobile phone or computer . 2 . ​Realize the principle of resource sharing and resource integration . The application for registration of the select entity form be process through AI and OCR technology . There be a complete mechanism to avoid duplication of manual procedure , time-consuming and error-prone situation . Through information technology , automate relate manual process to improve accuracy and business efficiency . 3 . The application process be integrate . It be recommend to apply for a `` Financial All-in-One Card '' account that can be use back to the mainland and share the resource with this application for money distribution . Residents who need to apply for a `` Financial All-In-One Card '' account should apply at the time of payment registration . Solution Description: There be many problem with exist indoor positioning service ( IPSs ) . First and foremost , a poorly construct and inaccurate map be the culprit to poor user experience . Besides , exhibition booth wall may cause IPS signal to drop off , and the result patchy connection would far frustrate user . Interference be also cause by reflective signal , or in multi-storey location , signal from other floor . Such noise would interfere with positioning and undermine accuracy . Dolphin IPS be an effective indoor position system provide low cost , high accuracy , Plug-and-Play infrastructure and good user experience , and it be actually employ a proprietary fusion algorithm ( include optimise BLE beacon setting , site planning , multilateral positioning , noise reduction , change event , special event handling and stabilisation , etc . ) .

Use Case: Our solution provide low-cost , stable , accurate indoor position system with broad coverage that people can be easily to know where they be and find the way to reach the destination . The solution can also apply to other place e.g . school , university , hospital , smart building , shop mall , theme park , car park , etc .

Solution Description: The recent spread of COVID-19 have highlight the need for effective quarantine measure facilitate by the use of technology . CenTrak offer a practical and affordable solution to isolate and contain infectious disease through the use of active-RFID technology . The solution include a simple-to-install home network access point , small comfortable quarantine wrist strap tag wear by individual in isolation and cloud-based software to easily configure setting such as isolation time and alert , allow for remote monitoring of thousand of location . The use of this system include effective monitoring of high-risk individual and infectious disease management . Secondary benefit of the system include reduce the infection rate of a give population which have a positive effect on the society and the economy at large .

However , to effectively flatten the curve , every single person should put effort to counter the spread of the virus . Solution Description: To support hyper-scale storage management across multiple geographical region , we posit that Hyperconverged Infrastructure ( HCI ) should be gear towards geo-distributed deployment . A geo-distributed HCI can follow a hierarchical topology : it be compose of multiple DCs that reside in different geographical region , in which each DC be compose of multiple node ( or server ) for storage . Thus , a geo-distributed HCI unify the storage space across different geographical region to form a global-scale storage pool . One critical deployment requirement of a geo-distributed HCI be to maintain availability and durability guarantee in the presence of failure , range from transient failure where data be temporarily unavailable ( e.g. , power loss , network disconnection , system upgrade , reboots ) , to permanent failure where data be permanently lose ( e.g. , disk crash , sector error ) . Cloud outage be common in practice . Storing data with redundancy be a typical fault-tolerant approach , as any lost or unavailable data can be recover through the available redundant data . Traditional distributed storage system use replication to provide fault tolerance . The idea be to create multiple identical copy ( call replica ) for each data chunk and distribute the replica across different node . However , the storage overhead of replication be significant , and pose a scalability concern with the unprecedented growth of data volume . We present our core technology , network coding , propose by the research team at the Chinese University of Hong Kong in 2000 . Network cod provide a promising low-cost redundancy mechanism to achieve fault tolerance , while significantly reduce the storage overhead compare to traditional replication and achieve optimal repair performance with theoretical guarantee . It belong to a special class of erasure cod . We first formalize the terminology of erasure coding , and then elaborate how network cod improve the repair performance .
Application Areas:
Infrastructure
GovCloud
Technologies Used:
Cloud Computing
Network Coding
Use Case: High storage efficiency : nCloud leverage network cod to minimize the amount of storage redundancy compare to traditional replication , thereby save the long-term operational cost . High performance : nCloud mitigate the cross-DC traffic to maintain high repair performance . It also mitigate the overhead on other application that share the cross-DC bandwidth . High fault tolerance : nCloud achieves high fault tolerance via network cod in two aspect : ( i ) availability , which mean that any unavailable data remain accessible through data redundancy , and ( ii ) durability , which mean there be no data loss in the face of node or DC failure . Security via diversity : nCloud exploit secret sharing ( see our previous work CDStore [ 22 ] ) to generate secure cod chunk ( call share ) , such that an adversary can not recover the store data if the number of share be insufficient . Software-defined storage management : nCloud provide a configurable , software-defined storage management framework to readily address the heterogeneity of storage resource and application requirement .
Model Input: nCloud Fault-Tolerant Geo-distributed Hyperconverged Infrastructure (HCI). Solution Name (Eng): 3D Spatial Intelligence Platform for flow and traffic managements
Solution Description: Outsight 3D Spatial Intelligence Platform be a computer vision-based flow and traffic management solution . The platform make use of multiple Outsight 3D Semantic Cameras , which have the capability of an active infrared 3D Laser , an optional RGB 2D Camera , and an intelligence embed processing unit , to create a real-time regional live map with all people , vehicle and item in the area of interest . The platform deliver real-time predictive analytics , KPI , alert and query for end-user to take the best decision in response to the event of interest . The real-time situation awareness capability assist end-user to visualize real-time footfall , wait time , individual and aggregated behavior , to spot key event that require attention and interpret long-term trend . The platform detects and understand the interaction between person and object to guide the optimization of any facility , asset ’ usage and usage experience . The security awareness of the platform also provide timely security-related alert and track without the need of a visual 2D camera .
Application Areas:
City Management
Environment
Law and Security

Solution Description: Immersive Education Academy be an education technology company base in Hong Kong . Over the past 8 year we have develop and streamline a custom build AI and IT enhance learn management system that be capable of automatically create personalize content and learning plan for teacher and student . This platform be be use mainly for English learning but it can be use for other subject application as well . There be three main objective that we focus on : - Increased engagement for student - Personalized learning plan for student - Reduced workload for teacher and student Our company 's technology achieve this by collect large quantity of learn behavior data from student and then identify key data correlation which be then use to create personalized learn model for student . The recommended plan be provide to the teacher . The expected result be an increase in student learning efficiency and performance outcome . This project be in support the government ’ s Smart City initiative . Specifically , the main policy list below : ( a ) make use of innovation and technology ( I & T ) to address urban challenge , enhance the effectiveness of city management and improve people ’ s quality of living as well as Hong Kong ’ s sustainability , efficiency and safety ; ( b ) enhance Hong Kong ’ s attractiveness to global business and talent ; and ( c ) inspire continuous city innovation and sustainable economic development . Our project have synergy with the above policy direction because our project incorporate the development of AI and IT enhance technology that be mean for use in the education sector . The project also aim to use the data that be collect to improve the overall efficiency of education by build individualized learning model which can be use to support teacher and student at different education level . Moreover , while current learn subject use this model be mainly relate to English education , the learning platform and model can be expand adapt to other learning subject . Within the Smart City initiative , the policy relate to Smart People be most relevant as this project can be use to cultivate a learning environment for student that incorporate AI and IT learning tool , and can further support the development of local talent by mean of English language learn - far enhance the city international reputation and workforce readiness with the multinational company base in Hong Kong .

Below be our proposed solution for the “ Smart ” Car Park Management System : 1 ) Allow the driver to make pre-booking through mobile APP/website . A cloud base Car Park Management System to be implement . It be a web and mobile application to allow driver to make pre-booking through Mobile App or website . The function be park space reservation , payment , car search and other function , etc . 2 ) Check the real-time vacant parking space through mobile APP/website . NB- IoT device will be instal to monitor and detect vehicle occupancy in real time , allow car park to increase utilization and improve efficiency . Users can query the number of occupied or idled car space via the mobile app or website . 3 ) Facilitate the public to find parking space . Our intelligent parking IoT system can realize data share by use network technology , and can provide real-time feedback on the number of car and park lot information , and guide the driver to stop and pick up the car . 4 ) Navigate the driver to locate his/her own vehicle in the car park . AIoT and OCR technology would also be use for recognize vehicle model and their number plate , in order to identify the vehicle and help driver to find their car . 5 ) Adopt new payment mean such as QR code payment , NFC payment , etc . For the traditional parking management method that use manual cash charge . Our new charge system of the intelligent parking loT be undoubtedly powerful . Intelligent park IoT generally adopt IC card charge system , such as QR Code payment , NFC Payment , etc . Drivers can make payment via website , Mobile Apps , Exit Gate , Parking Machines , etc . In addition , the network video surveillance system can supervise the toll collector , which can effectively manage financial security . Apart from above function , our solution also provide report for data analysis , such as : • Provide sale report , marketing analysis and billing • Provide operator visibility on customer behaviour through big-data analytics , enable them to develop personalised promotion and propose value-added service to increase revenue and customer satisfaction

Solution Description: We develop our InterOps Accelerator ( iA ) to be a PaaS ( Platform as a Service ) ecosystem with the intention of automate process to achieve reduction of MTTD & MTTR ( Mean Time to Detection & Resolution , ) gain efficiency , and close the gap between IT operation & cybersecurity . All with a goal of SecOps Automation . The challenge currently in Security Operations be 1 ) a shortage in skilled resource , 2 ) an increase volume of threat and impossibility of rely upon manual operation , 3 ) a lack of integrated solution ( or Single Pane of Glass , “ SPoG ” ) to visualize analyzed Big Data , automate in the resolution process to reduce cyber risk as rapidly as they be increase . We refer to the way we address the 3rd problem as AI2 or Artificial & Augmented Intelligence . This ecosystem will provide preventative intelligence for any organization to address identified vulnerability and deploy test remediation base upon community input or our PaaS validation to execute the resolution process with or without iA . Or Preventative Intelligence can be access by subscription or without charge to reduce the MTTD & MTTR .

Solution Description: `` Intelligent Data Platform '' be a total solution which ( 1 ) automate the process of data mine process , ( 2 ) provide a platform for search , analyze and visualize large amount of text data in different format . This enhance user ' capability to quickly collect data to find insight from a large amount of unstructured data . The `` Intelligent Data Platform '' be unique with the following feature : ( 1 ) a powerful search algorithm that can match similar context and support complex search logic , ( 2 ) customizable filter to narrow down the result accord to customize rule and taxonomy , ( 3 ) similarity search to automatically find related document , ( 4 ) machine read extraction that support OCR and more complex extraction rule , ( 5 ) support integration and add-on such as RPA , ERP and chatbots . The type of data format we support include but not limited to PDF ( text-searchable or image ) , JPEG , TIFF , PNG , DOC/DOCX , XLS/XLSX , etc . Key benefit : 1 . Smarter than “ Google ” with customizable synonym dictionary . 2 . No more `` Ctrl+F '' : the solution save time with click-to-highlight function to pinpoint key phrase from any hundred page of document . 3 . Customizable filter to allow flexibility to add and edit filter 4 . Fast ROI : browser-based , easy to deploy and operate .

Solution Description: Queue-it be the original virtual waiting room , design to put you back in control of your website performance during peak demand . When online visitor exceed your capacity , they be redirect to a customizable virtual waiting room and then throttle back to your website or app in a controlled first-come , first-served order . What you get with Queue-it ? Deliver Protect your reputation and create a seamless , brand experience for high-demand sale . Put visitor in a fair first-in , first-out line , harness queue psychology , and tap into social proof . Manage Control be at your fingertip with GO Queue-it , our web-based admin platform . Solution Name (Eng): LiDAR Road Monitoring Solutions based on Deep Learning Technology

Company Name (Tc): 益维科技有限公司（香港）
Solution Description: Our solution be base on self-developed LiDAR component and deep-learning technique . Our LiDAR use solid-state scan method to acquire 3D point cloud information of the target at a very high dynamic range . No image information be involve in this process . Our self-developed deep-learning technology can provide function of target identification and classification . Related solution have be verify by multiple application case in Mainland China . The strength of this solution be comprehensive . Our self-developed hardware product and software function be support by our innovative entrepreneurial team , which have be widely recognize all over the world during the CES 2018 & CES 2019 . We can provide good cost control and service of customized function develop ; Moreover , it be currently the only LiDAR component that can realize mass production capability ; Finally , our related experience in various user scenario especially in similar case can provide powerful support for these project .
Application Areas:
City Management
Population
Transport
Technologies Used:
Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Data Analytics
Deep Learning
Internet of Things (IoT)
Machine Learning
Optics Engineering
Use Case: Vision-based solution be widely use as a traditional method for city management , traffic surveillance and street monitoring . However , some concern relate to privacy have attract much more attention during the monitoring and surveillance process . From technical level , vision-based solution still encounter many challenge such as high dynamic range and stable performance towards the changeable environment . LiDAR be an innovative technology for active target sensing , which can be use as an alternative solution for monitor and surveillance need at privacy-sensitive scenario . No image information be directly capture from the component . 3D point cloud information be use to describe the target , include its 3D shape , 3D spatial position , and move speed . The benefit of LiDAR solution be comprehensive . No image information be include during the monitoring process can provide maximum protection of privacy . Moreover , LiDAR can provide high dynamic range detection to adapt a complex external environment , include light intensity , weather , and the speed of vehicle . Finally , the stability and reliability of our LiDAR product be trustworthy due to the requirement of the vehicle regulation level . We have already launch multiple project for traffic surveillance in mainland China . Our solution have service multiple speedway with a few hundred of LiDAR component put into use .

Seclore Rights Management protect sensitive information regardless of device or location . Whether a file be on a server , in an email , on a mobile device , or copy to a USB memory stick unintentionally leave behind in an airport , unauthorized user will not be able to access the information . Since usage policy stay with the file , Seclore enable organization to securely adopt the Cloud , BYOD , and external collaboration . Seclore make it easy to centrally define , associate , enforce , modify and audit granular file usage permission , include : - WHO can access the file ? User or Groups Within or Outside the Organization - WHAT can they do with it ? View , Edit , Print , Copy Content , Take Screen Grabs , Work Offline - WHEN can they do it ? Solution Description: Why Critical Event Management ( CEM ) ? Sure , you have detail emergency preparedness program and your business continuity planning be up-to-date , but with an increasingly complex and unpredictable threat environment , it have never be more imperative to act faster . With more complete intelligence , you ’ ll be able to increase your speed and decisiveness in order to assess risk and prevent them from harm your people or disrupt your operation . A Critical Event Management platform use technology to take manual process and automate them . Amplifying ad hoc data feed to provide rich intelligence and correlate threat with location of asset and people , ensure more rapid and comprehensive incident assessment and remediation . Some case include : [ 1 ] Front-end staff which need in-person interaction - it help to protect and actively disinfect while monitor his/her track within department to trace automatically and sterilize the route specifically [ 2 ] Personnels who work both outdoors and in mobility mode - to provide extra protection and track inside and outside within HK [ 3 ] It can be equip for those activity like HKTDC exhibition or show where mass amount of person need to be properly monitor [ 4 ] Those person who be under quarantine track - It be use to trace , protect and disinfect all in one device . Alert back to control centre if the person turn in bad health status or stay away from quarantine apartment location .

Solution Description: Gianthouse be specialize in provide customize mobile development service use hybrid development framework , namely React Native . The mobile app develop use hybrid framework be operable on both iOS and Android , that be the most commonly use operate system of mobile device . This reduce the development cost of mobile apps significantly as only one app that can fit into two operate system be develop , instead of develop two native apps separate for iOS and Android . In a product development cycle , we first collect and discuss the requirement with user , and then design the user interface ( UI ) and user experience ( UX ) for the application . Afterwards , we start to implement the software and run sprint cycle to build and test the app . Once the development be complete , the project will be launch and move to maintenance phase . In addition , Gianthouse adopt a mixture of waterfall and agile approach as development methodology . Agile approach be use in software development to promote velocity and adaptability , since the benefit of such approach be that adjustment can be make along the product development cycle rather than follow a strict waterfall path . One of the aim of an agile approach be to reduce the development cost and shorten the prototyping process .

Solution Description: With the development and general application of Video Analytics Technology , Smart Parking Solution be not only bound to License Plate Recognition and Ticketless function any more . The following systems/features be also design by our company to cater the grow need of our client , derive from the application of Video Analytics Technology . 1 . Auto-Classification of Vehicle Type for fee-calculation or restriction Functions : Detect Car type , brand and model for different rate structure . No need to install another ticket unit for lorry . Especially suitable for car park with load bay and private car bay . 2 . Dynamic Rate Structure on Bay Location Functions : Different rate for bay at different location via video monitoring camera . Drivers , who be willing to pay more or in a rush , can park at bay with good location at high rate . Bays allocation can be more efficiently manage . 3 . Bay-Counting function for Motorcycles Functions : Motorcyclists can be inform of the floor with the most space at entry . Technically , this function be almost unachievable with just sensor for detection in the past . 4 . Outdoor Parking Space Monitoring / Counting Functions : This function help to achieve the function of Bay Guidance for outdoor car park . This solution be much more cost-effective than instal a sensor on every single bay for detection . 5 . Loading Bay Barrier-less Monitoring and Charging Function Functions : Helps to overcome the general pinpoint of instal a barrier system for a loading bay for rate calculation and payment . 6 . Smart Bay Guidance Signage for EV Cars Functions : Helps to direct EV Cars to the near and available bay with EV charger . Highly reduce congestion issue at a car park . Enhance user experience and convenience . 7 . Mobile Parking Fee Payment via License Plate or Octopus Number Functions : Reduce the issue of insufficient remain value for Octopus Cards at the Exit . Highly ease the issue of queue at the exit . Vehicles with no outstanding payment can be allow to leave by detection of the License Plate . Our company have engage and specialize in the field of Car Park Management System for the past two decade and be dedicate to provide top-of-tier technology and state-of-art product to our client . Most of our product be prove with track record in the market or standard product from our manufacturer with different type of internationally recognize certificate . Product quality and technical know-how on our system be guarantee with our company . Our service pledge for this Solution include : 1 . 98 % or above for License Plate Recognition Accuracy Rate 2 . Provisions of two LPR/Video Cameras per lane at different location 3 . Expertise on camera location selection 4 . Provision of progressive training on OCR engine and Deep Learning capability 5 . Solution Description: Talos be an Appium & Selenium base framework that provide the blueprint for test automation project . It be the tool-of-choice for mobile app tester and developer . The wide range of helper function and clear tutorial help user write test case easily . Our team customize the framework to be an all-in-one and easy-to-use solution . Talos eliminate user ’ extra effort of configure the machine and write fundamental test script , allow user to save time and focus on write test case . Monitoring and debugging be easy with real-time screenshots and human-readable test report .
Application Areas:
Commerce and Industry
Development
Education
Finance
Infrastructure
Talos supports automated UI and functional testing for web and mobile application in any industry.
Technologies Used:
Cloud Computing
Mobile Technologies
Talos is an Appium & Selenium based framework that provides the blueprint for test automation projects. It supports testing for all Android,iOS and Web applications spanning from the setup procedures to providing clear and comprehensive test reports.
Use Case: Talos support test for all Android , iOS and Web application span from the setup procedure to provide clear and comprehensive test report . With a simplify yet thorough setup with the provided Talos guideline , setup time can be streamline to a 2 to 3 day implementation process whereas other automated solution may take up to 2 to 3 week to setup . With Talos , simply setup the framework base and page model base to create the test script to test the desired page model and test case . Talos Framework ’ s test script be form by 2 main element , the Test Case and Page Model . Test Cases be store in a test file . The program will execute test case inside the test file . A test file can include one more test case , depend on how to group the test case . There be no standard of group test case , it differ among project . Every Test Case be write as a sequence of action . Those action be call from Page Model . The Page Model include all action in all page , and every action be a function . The function of the logic to perform the action . Once test be complete , Talos ’ overall test report will show the result of the test case with pas percentage , test view , suite view and time take for the test . The reliable and easy to digest report will show passed case with multiple screen shot in one test script . For failed case , there will be a screen capture and log of the case make it easy to find the root cause of the failed case , for user to reference at which point in the upgrade do the code start to fail . Users can run the test at any time to debug their code and successfully launch their project . Talos be also a highly reliable test solution suitable for all business due to the reduced business expense in the long run . While the initial cost of automated testing be high than manual testing , Cherrypicks ’ research reflect that if a project will run for more than 11 month and consists of rapid deployment of new feature automate test with Talos will be greatly favorable . Talos • Supports testing for all Android , iOS and Web application • Provided Talos guideline • Streamlined 2 to 3 day implementation process • What we provide in Talos ’ overall test report • Pass percentage • Tests view • Suite view • Time take for the test • Screen Shots on each test page • We help you reduce business expense in long run • Project will run more than 11 month • Rapidly deployment of new feature • We eliminate the high cost of hire a full team of human tester

Solution Name (Eng): RoomQ virtual waiting room for massive traffic
Solution Description: The COVID19 pandemic force many traditional face to face offline activity to online . The architecture and throughput of legacy online portal built year ago be not design for this overwhelmed demand . With the late cloud compute technology , RoomQ help to streamline website traffic by set up a virtual waiting room in front of the exist system . RoomQ act as the frontline to buffer traffic so that the exist system will not be bring down to out of service . The integration be very minimal , as simple as a one-line code change . RoomQ also offer mobile SDK for exist mobile apps to integrate seamlessly . The service work under a SAAS ( Software As A Service ) model . It be the most cost-effective solution for expect or unexpected peak traffic .
Application Areas:
City Management
Commerce and Industry
Education
Employment and Labour
Environment
Technologies Used: Cloud Computing
Use Case: Take book a badminton court online for example , RoomQ can help to queue visitor one by one , show how many visitor be before them in order to enter the booking system . This will protect the system from run out of resource due to sudden traffic , and give a good user experience as the user will not have to refresh frequently and retry until they see the response from the busy system . With minimal code change , the exist system can support any kind of traffic without rearchitecting and rebuild the whole system . This save capital cost and improve the availability of the system . This system particularly work well with an exist user login system / membership system , as by just do many logins together , contention occurs and the system 's availability and user experience will be jeopardise .

Solution Name (Eng): IoT Sensors and Automatic Monitoring System (AMS)
Solution Description: Automatic Monitoring System ( AMS ) include web-based application and different IoT Geo-technical Sensors such as Tilt , Vibration , Water Level & Crack or IoT Surveying Sensors such as GNSS & Robotic Total Station . Measurements from IoT Sensors be send to the AMS regularly via mobile communication network e.g 4G . Data will be process and visualize in graphical format . Most of IoT Sensors have built-in battery which can last for week or month to support 7 * 24 automatic operation . Users can access the graphical data easily by mobile phone or PC use browser . If the movement out of 3A ( Alert Action Alarm ) limit , Email or SMS will be send to related person . Users can access the data anytime in anyplace for the late update . Routine on-site inspection , survey and maintenance can be reduce . Even in COVID19 situation , the system be still run and user can access it at home .
Application Areas:
City Management
Climate and Weather
Environment
Housing
Infrastructure
Transport
Technologies Used:
Cloud Computing
Internet of Things (IoT)
Mobile Technologies
Use Case: 8 GNSS be setup in the Kai Cheung Road Bridge ( above Kai Fuk Road ) to monitor the settlement of the bridge . 8 Tilt sensor be setup in 4 bridge column and 4 abutment to monitor the movement . All data be send to AMS . Engineers and Surveyors of government department , consultant and contractor can access the AMS in office or at home to check the bridge status and change . Routine site inspection , survey and maintenance can be highly reduce . Construction can be carry out without stop . If there be any movement or settlement out of the 3A limit , related person will be notify by email . It also save time for report . Action can be take on time . In overall , it save time , labour & simplify the workflow and reporting . It also improve safety and break the limit of normal working time and place .

Solution Name (Eng): Siemens Mobility (e-)bike sharing powered by AI
Solution Description: Our bike share system provide a state-of-the-art operating system , power by AI ( machine learning and data analytics ) feature to optimize the operation and maintenance of the bike share system , and increase customer satisfaction . The system provide a smart phone app include payment function . The proposed bicycle can be convert from conventional to electrical bike and vice versa , depend on the customer ( end-user ) demand and preferred deployment mode . Our concept foresee a station-based approach , which ensure that the share bike be always maintain and in a good shape ( ready to use for the public ) . A manage bike share system be key to gain the public acceptance , gain a high quality of service for the public , as well as to avoid that bike get dump within the public road network , river or the ocean . Furthermore , base on our experience the provision of e-bikes lead to a high acceptance in hot climate zone , as well as by young and old citizen , due to the fact that the bike ride be more convenient .
Application Areas:
City Management
Environment
Health
Infrastructure
Recreation and Culture
Transport
Technologies Used:
Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Cloud Computing
Data Analytics
Internet of Things (IoT)
Machine Learning
Mobile Technologies
Predictive Analytics
Use Case: This bike-sharing system provide an economical alternative to public transport for the public ; this will have an impact on traffic diversion hence to mitigate traffic congestion . This be not only an economical alternative for the public , but also an eco-friendly alternative . Bikes be electrically assist ; the power of the electric motor doesn ’ t exceed 250W which complies with the European standard . The electric motor assistance end when the cyclist stop pedal and allow each charge-up to power the system for a minimum of 7 day after the start of a trip . These bike be also design to be as user-friendly as possible . Each bike be ergonomically design to provide comfortable ride to the cyclist , as well as an electronic locker equip that allow park for temporary stop . Furthermore , the bike enable parent cyclist to attach a bike baby chair . Bike share will support and promote the image of Hong Kong as a green and sustainable city . Managed bike share system support the reduction of carbon emission , a healthy lifestyle and tourism ( many tourist like to use bike share system as great alternative to explore the city and surroundings – the acceptance and utilization be quite high if the service quality be match their expectation ) . With Siemens Mobility late IoT and AI technology , sustainability in a long run in all aspect be guarantee , e.g . efficiency monitoring , smart data analysis for performance enhancement , fast track for maintenance , energy saving , smart advertising etc . Costs : • Initial installation cost depend on the select service area . • Promotion to the public be recommend .

Solution Name (Eng): Mixed language Chatbot system with AI and voice functions

Solution Description: Brief introduction : Our solution allow quick deploy and easy maintenance of chatbots and voicebots . We have a graphical user interface for chatbot conversation building . Users without technical knowledge can access or modify the chatbot . We also have a AI system which allow continuous and sustainable supervised machine learn training . That one , also , can be access or manage by user without technical knowledge . The main usage for the chatbots be : - general enquiry / FAQ - order/job management - surveying Features : 1. support mixed language - Cantonese , Chinese , English 2. support text & voice 3. real AI - not base in keywords 4. language model tailor make for Hong Kong 5. low TCO ( total cost of ownership ) - easy maintenance 6. decision logic tree - unlike other chatbots in the market , ours be more like human . It can ask follow up question , it have memory , and it be intelligent . All the logic can be pre-set by user . 7. high accuracy - before train - 90 % , after train - 97 % 8. strong fallback mechanism - fallback should be eliminate , however , if there be a fallback , we have a complete solution to handle . Fallbacks can trigger a ticket in our chat monitor , or can initiate notification ( email , api , etc ) . Service level : 1 . After UAT and system launch , we monitor closely the performance for 1 month . On some period , we monitor every single enquiry to ensure correctness of the chatbot . 2 . After 1 month of close monitoring , we 'll keep monitoring every day . 3 . AI model be update every several day to keep accuracy high . Security & sustainability : 1 . Our solution can be on premise or cloud base . For on premise one , for security concern , apart from the application system , even the AI training part , can be do on premise too . 2 . Also we 've a data masking algorithm , that mask all sensitive entity information in the data , provide maximum security . 3 . The language model train during development and deployment , will be own by the Government . It can be transfer to other vendor for continuous development in the future . 4 . Our technology use be develop by our company , or use open source library . All of our training data to build the model be own by our company . 5 . The chatbots develop will be closed chatbots , they will not extract information from outside the scope define by user . 6 . Scalability - we support multi channel chatbots , they can serve multiple client at the same time . Our solution include the following system : 1. chatbot design platform 2 . AI NLP engine 3. speech recognition & text to speech engine 4 . AI training module 5 . Integration module

Solution Name (Eng): BLOK Pass App for Travel Bubble
Solution Name (TC): 旅遊氣泡 BLOK Pass App
Solution Description: BLOK Pass app be a platform to enable business and societal continuity in this and future health crisis . At its core be a self-sovereign identity and health status attestation solution—people can store all information need to access office , transport , public space use a BLOK Pass app that be own and control only by the user . With appropriate test protocol in place and with information on an individual ’ s COVID-19 status store on the BLOK App , the establishment of travel bubble be make possible . The platform be easily configurable , and can be adapt to monitor a wide variety of evidence types—including anti-SARS-CoV-2 antibody status or T cell immunity—to reflect the late scientific evidence and diagnostic technology . Symptoms can be track , and test result of all kind ( laboratory or rapid point-of-care PCR , antigen , antibody , etc . ) can be validate , attest and store for use in access protocols/ These can be define and configure accord to rule establish by government , border control , transport provider , entertainment and event venue provider , company , etc .

Commerce and Industry
Health
Population

Transport
Technologies Used:
Blockchain
Mobile Technologies
Use Case: As mention above , the BLOK Pass app can form the core of a travel bubble solution : It provide a mean by which traveller can log COVID-19 test result and declare any symptom they may be display , while have all this information store securely on their device ; it communicate to relevant personnel/authorities what appropriate action should be take accord to the traveller ’ health status and their company ’ s/country ’ s protocol , without reveal any further information about the traveller . BLOK Pass app have also be design to be easily integrate with exist APIs and contact-tracing solution , mean that cross-border compatibility be unlikely to be an issue . The cost of the BLOK Pass app ( HK $ 50 ) be far exceed by its potential benefit . The average overnight visitor per caput spending in 2018 be HK $ 6,614 , and recent figure indicate that tourist arrival in the January-August period decline by 91.9 percent YoY ; the successful implementation of travel bubble be imperative to the revival of the battered tourism sector .

Company Name (Tc): 精銳動力科技有限公司
Solution Description: Office Delivery Robot be able to navigate in the indoor environment autonomously by SLAM technology . The robot use advanced algorithm and can navigate without ground marking , bar code , and track . Quick activation : No need for identification and signal receiver . Various top module be design for deliver different good and item , such as beverage and paper file , from one location to another location at same floor level . The robot can follow the person to a designate location and maintain a safe distance of 1-1.5 meter . The robot return to its original location by navigate along its own preset route . The robot can withstand people interference when someone pass between , it can keep and reach the target destination . The navigation system use a 3D camera and two 270-degree diagonally place optical radar detection scan function to achieve good path planning and collision avoidance in an unstructured environment . Pre-records the waypoint in a known map , the robot can travel to pre-defined destination . With the application of Office Delivery Robot , less effort of Workman be require and thus to help improve office efficiency and productivity . The robot can be tailor-made correspond to customer 's requirement such as add digital lock .
